name: avocado and lump crab salad
description: this stuffed avocado and lump crab salad is light and fresh, made with lime juice, olive oil, cilantro and red onion . so quick because there is no cooking involved
ingredients: 1 medium hass avocado, 4 oz lump crab meat, 2 tbsp chopped red onion, 1 1/2 tbsp fresh lime juice, 1 tbsp chopped fresh cilantro, 2 grape tomatoes, 1/2 tsp olive oil, 1/4 tsp salt and fresh black pepper, 2 leaves butter lettuce
steps: in a medium bowl, combine onion, lime juice, cilantro, tomato, olive oil, 1/8 tsp salt and fresh pepper, to taste . add crab meat and gently toss . cut the avocado open, remove pit and peel the skin or spoon the avocado out . season with remaining 1/8 tsp salt and fill the avocado halves equally with crab salad . this makes 2 servings, place on two plates with lettuce if you wish and serve.

name: chicken sausage and peppers macaroni casserole
description: chicken sausage, bell peppers, onions and mushrooms simmered in a marinara sauce then baked in the casserole with whole wheat macaroni topped with mozzarella.
ingredients: 14 ounces chicken sausage, 1 tbsp olive oil, 1 cup chopped onion, 1 medium red pepper, 1 medium yellow pepper, 3 cloves chopped garlic, 1 cup sliced mushrooms, 1 14.5 oz can petite diced tomatoes, drained, 2 cups marinara sauce, 2 cups water, 1/2 tsp italian seasoning or dried thyme, 1 tsp kosher salt, 8 oz shredded mozzarella cheese, 8 oz uncooked delallo whole wheat or gluten free elbows
steps: preheat oven to 350degf . in a large deep non stick skillet, brown the sausage over high heat until cooked through, seasoning with a pinch of salt and breaking it up into smaller pieces as it cooks . set aside on a dish . add olive oil to the skillet, reduce heat to medium and add the onions, garlic and peppers saute until the vegetables soft, about 6 to 7 minutes . return the sausage to the skillet along with the remaining ingredients except for the pasta and cheese . bring to a boil and then lower heat to medium low and simmer for 10 minutes, until the vegetables are soft . spoon just enough of the sausage/vegetable mixture to cover the bottom of a 9x13 pan . cover with uncooked pasta . spoon remaining sauce mixture evenly over the top and sprinkle with cheese . cover with foil and bake 50 55 minutes . remove from oven and let stand, covered, for 15 minutes . divide into 8 servings.

name: southern style pork stir fry
description: southern style pork stir fry with pork tenderloin, vegetable oil, salt, pepper, sweet potatoes, water, onion, raisins, cornstarch, white wine, apples
ingredients: 1.0 pound pork tenderloin, 2.0 teaspoon vegetable oil, salt, pepper, 2.0 sweet potatoes, 0.5 cup water, 1.0 onion, 2.0 tablespoon raisins, 1.0 tablespoon cornstarch, 0.2 cup white wine, 2.0 cup apples
steps: cut tenderloin into 1/4 inch slices . in wok or frying pan, stir fry pork, half at a time, in hot oil for 4 5 minutes . remove pork to a platter and season with salt and pepper . peel sweet potatoes and cut into 1x1/2x1/4 inch strips . add potatoes and water to wok, cover and cook 5 minutes . return pork to wok along with onion and raisins . continue to stir fry 3 minutes . combine cornstarch and wine and stir into pork mixture . cook and stir until sauce is thickened . fold in apple wedges and stir fry 1 minute . serve with hot rice.

name: low carb garlic mustard baked ham
description: whether you're watching your carb intake or not, this savory baked ham is mouthwatering . the recipe is a yummly original created by sara mellas https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/sara 20mellas .
ingredients: 1.0 spiral sliced bone in ham, 0.5 cup mustard, 2.0 tablespoon salted butter, 2.0 teaspoon honey, 2.0 teaspoon garlic powder, 1.0 teaspoon onion powder, 1.0 teaspoon paprika
steps: set a rack to the lowest position in the oven . preheat oven to 325degf . line a roasting pan with aluminum foil, and position a roasting rack in the pan . place ham on the middle of roasting rack . pat the ham dry with paper towels to help the mustard mixture adhere better . place the mustard, melted butter, and spices in a large mixing bowl . whisk vigorously until thoroughly combined . spoon the mustard mixture over the ham . use the back of a spoon to spread the mustard into a thick layer over the surface of the ham . bake ham on lowest rack of oven until it has reached an internal temperature of about 145degf and the mustard coating is browned, 2 2 1/2 hours, or about 15 minutes per pound of ham . check to see that the ham is done . remove from oven or add time as needed . allow ham to cool on roasting rack for 15 minutes . transfer to cutting board, then carve and serve . refrigerate leftovers in an airtight container for up to 3 days.

name: brownie ice cream pizza
description: brownie ice cream pizza with brownie mix, skippy creamy peanut butter, breyers natural vanilla ice cream, strawberries, chocolate syrup
ingredients: 15.5 ounce brownie mix, 0.5 cup skippy creamy peanut butter, 1.5 quart breyers natural vanilla ice cream, 2.0 cup strawberries, 0.2 cup chocolate syrup
steps: preheat oven to 350deg . spray 12 inch pizza pan with nonstick cooking spray set aside . prepare brownie mix according to package directions . pour into prepared pan . bake 23 minutes or just until center is firm . cool on wire rack, about 20 minutes . freeze 1 hour or until frozen . evenly spread skippy creamy peanut butter on brownie pizza, leaving 1 inch border . top with scoops of breyers natural vanilla ice cream arranged in a ring . fill with fruit, then drizzle with chocolate syrup.

name: taiwanese meat sauce lo bah
description: grandma's recipe
ingredients: 6.0 shiitake mushrooms, 0.2 onion, 2.0 pound ground pork, 1.0 tablespoon avocado oil, 1.5 tablespoon brown sugar, 4.0 tablespoon liquid aminos, 0.5 cup fried garlic, 1.0 cup fried shallots, 1.0 can quail eggs
steps: add oil to pan, and cook diced onion and shiitake mushrooms on medium heat . add ground pork . avoid stirring too frequently . before pork is fully cooked, add brown sugar . then, allow pork to fully cook . add some water from soaking the shiitake mushrooms, or alternatively chicken broth . add more soy sauce, as needed, and quail eggs . simmer on low for 20 25 minutes.

name: garlic shrimp in coconut milk, tomatoes and cilantro
description: a quick shrimp stew cooked in a tomato coconut broth with a hint of lime and cilantro . simple enough to make for a weekday dinner yet sophisticated enough to serve to company . serve with a little brown basmati rice to soak up the broth.
ingredients: 1 1/4 lbs peeled and deviened jumbo shrimp, 1 tsp olive oil, 1 red bell pepper, 4 scallions, 1/2 cup chopped cilantro, 4 cloves garlic, 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, 1/2 tsp crushed red pepper flakes, 14.5 oz can diced tomatoes, 14 oz can light coconut milk, 1/2 lime
steps: in a medium pot, heat oil on medium low heat . add red peppers and saute until soft, about 4 minutes . add scallion whites, 1/4 cup cilantro, garlic and red pepper flakes, cook 1 minute . add tomatoes, coconut milk and 1/4 teaspoon salt, increase heat and bring to a boil, cover and simmer on low about 10 minutes to let the flavors blend and to thicken the sauce . add shrimp and cook 5 to 6 minutes, until opaque and cooked through . add lime juice . to serve, divide equally among 4 bowls, about 1 1/4 cups then top with scallions and cilantro.

name: apple and onion pork chops
description: apple and onion pork chops with pork chops, hots, i can't believe it's not butter spread, onion, ground cinnamon, apple, apple juice
ingredients: 4.0 pork chops, 1.0 teaspoon hots, 0.2 cup i can't believe it's not butter spread, 2.0 onion, 1.0 pinch ground cinnamon, 2.0 apple, 0.5 cup apple juice
steps: season chops, if desired, with salt and ground black pepper and curry . melt i can't believe it's not butter spread in 12 inch skillet over medium high heat and cook chops, turning occasionally, 8 minutes or until desired doneness . remove chops and set aside . cook onions in same skillet over medium heat, stirring occasionally, 7 minutes or until onions are golden brown . stir in apples and cinnamon and cook, stirring occasionally, 4 minutes or until apples are tender . stir in apple juice and cook, scraping up brown bits from bottom of skillet, 2 minutes . to serve, pour sauce over chops.

name: chicken cacciatore with portobellos and rosemary
description: chicken cacciatore with portobellos and rosemary with bertolli classico olive oil, chicken drumsticks, onion, portobello mushrooms, dry red wine, bertolli organic olive oil, basil and garlic sauce, fresh rosemary
ingredients: 2.0 tablespoon bertolli classico olive oil, 12.0 chicken drumsticks, 1.0 onion, 3.0 portobello mushrooms, 1.0 cup dry red wine, 1.0 jar bertolli organic olive oil, basil and garlic sauce, 1.0 teaspoon fresh rosemary
steps: season chicken, if desired with salt and ground black pepper . heat olive oil over medium high heat in large nonstick saucepot or deep 12 inch skillet and brown chicken in batches . remove chicken from saucepot and set aside reserve 1 tablespoon drippings . add onion and mushrooms to reserved drippings in same saucepot and cook, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes . add wine and cook 3 minutes . stir in sauce and rosemary . bring to a boil over high heat . reduce heat to low, then return chicken to saucepot . simmer covered, stirring occasionally, 30 minutes or until chicken is thoroughly cooked . serve, if desired, over hot cooked orzo and garnish with chopped fresh parsley.

name: apple juice and apple leather
description: learn to make homemade apple juice and apple leather, no apple press needed . simple old fashioned method for all natural tasty apple products
ingredients: 2 lbs unblemished apples, mix varieties for best flavor, water, 4 cups leftover apple pulp, 1 lemon, juiced, sweetener such as maple syrup, honey, or granulated sugar optional, spices, such as cinnamon, nutmeg, ginger, pumpkin pie blend
steps: wash and quarter apples no need to peel or core and toss them into a large pot . note if you have your own orchard, do not use windfalls for juice . damaged windfalls can be contaminated by wild animal droppings . pour in enough water to cover the apples . careful not to use too much water or the juice will be over diluted.bring the apples and water to the boil and cook until the fruit becomes soft about 15 minutes . mash the apples with a potato masher or the back of a spoon and leave to cool completely . ladle the pulp into cheesecloth and hang over a large bowl to drain . alternatively, you can set the cheesecloth into a colander and place it over a bowl . allow the juice to drain for several hours . chill and enjoy you can also freeze the juice for later use.to make fruit leather with leftover apple pulp, heat your oven to its lowest setting, no higher than 170 degrees . press the apple pulp through a food mill or mesh strainer to remove the seeds and skin . to the strained pulp, add half the lemon juice and sweetener if desired . if using granulated sugar you'll need to heat it together with the apple pulp in a saucepan till dissolved . add desired spices and taste . adjust the flavoring if needed.line a baking sheet with parchment or a silicone mat . place the puree on the baking sheet and smooth out to about 1/4 inch . heat in the low heat oven until thoroughly dried about 12 hours . place the fruit leather on a sheet of plastic wrap and roll . store in the fridge or freezer.

name: baked apple puff
description: sorted food baked apple puff https //sortedfood.com/applepuff/ wonderful for the fall, a quick dessert to use up extra apples
ingredients: 2.0 cooking apples, 1.0 lemon, 1.0 sheet puff pastry, cinnamon, 1.0 beaten egg, water, 1.0 handful raisins
steps: preheat oven to 430 degrees farenheit peel and core apples, then coat with lemon juice mix brown sugar cinnamon together cover apples in brown sugar cinnamon mixture cut out squares of puff pastry large enough to completely cover apple place apple in square, fill hollow core with sultanas brush edges of puff pastry with egg wash then carefully crimp/fold pastry around apple completely covering it cut off excess puff pastry brush all over with egg wash bake for 3o minutes all done

name: southwestern green chile pork roast
description: southwestern green chile pork roast with pork shoulder, olive oil, onion, tomatoes, green chiles, ground cumin, corn tortillas, salsa verde, avocados, sour cream
ingredients: 4.0 pound pork shoulder, 2.0 tablespoon olive oil, 1.0 cup onion, 14.5 ounce tomatoes, 8.0 ounce green chiles, 2.0 teaspoon ground cumin, corn tortillas, salsa verde, avocados, sour cream
steps: heat the oil in a large skillet over medium high heat . add pork and cook until browned on all sides, about 6 to 8 minutes, turning to brown each side . place pork in slow cooker and add onion, tomatoes, green chilies and cumin . season to taste with salt and pepper . add 1 cup water . cook on low for 6 to 8 hours, until tender remove pork and cool slightly . shred meat with a fork discarding fat . spoon some vegetables from the slow cooker over the pork . serve on corn tortillas and top with salsa verde, avocados and sour cream, if desired.

name: leftover turkey pot pie empanadas
description: these leftover turkey pot pie empanadas, or hand pies are a delicious way to use up your leftover thanksgiving turkey
ingredients: 1 teaspoon unsalted butter, 1/4 cup chopped onion, 1/4 cup chopped celery, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, 1 clove garlic, 1 tablespoon corn starch, 1/2 cup low sodium chicken or turkey broth, 1 1/4 cups leftover shredded cooked turkey breast, 3/4 cup frozen peas and carrots, 3/4 teaspoon kosher salt, 1/8 tsp ground black pepper, 1/2 tsp dried thyme, 10 frozen goya empanada discos, cooking spray, 1 large egg
steps: heat a skillet over medium heat, melt butter . add onion, celery, and parsley cooking until onions are translucent . add minced garlic, cooking for an additional minute . combine the broth and cornstarch together and mix well . add the turkey, frozen peas and carrots, 3/4 teaspoon salt, pepper, thyme and broth, stir and cook medium heat, bring to a boil then cook until thickened and heated through, 2 3 minutes . place a disc on your work surface . take 2 tablespoon of the turkey mixture and place in the middle of each disc . using a pastry brush, place the egg wash on the outer edges of the disc . fold the disc over and gently press the edges to create a seal . use a fork and press around the edges to seal . brush the egg wash over one side of each of the empanadas . spray the baking sheet with oil, bake 350f 26 to 30 minutes, until golden.

name: pate de atum com nozes
description: pate de atum com nozes with, , , , , , ,
ingredients: none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none
steps: escorre se o atum e esmaga se com um garfo . picam se os picles e juntam se no atum . bate se o iogurte com o sumo de limao, tempera se com sal e pimenta e envolve se no preparado de atum . juntam se as nozes picadas e a salsa picada . serve se com tostas.

name: sauteed baby zucchini
description: none
ingredients: 1 package, 1 tbsp olive oil, oregano, 1 clove garlic, salt and fresh pepper
steps: cut zucchinis in half lengthwise . season with salt and pepper . in a large saute pan, heat olive oil on medium high heat . add zucchini to pan, add oregano and saute about 2 minutes on each side . add garlic and cook another minute.

name: basic quinoa recipe
description: none
ingredients: 1 cup quinoa, 2 cups water, salt to taste
steps: wash quinoa and add to a medium saucepan . add water or broth, salt and boil, covered for 15 minutes or until all the water has absorbed . you will know when they are cooked when they are fluffy and you see a small thread . fluff with a fork and it will be ready to use for other recipes . you can store it in the refrigerator for 3 or 4 days and reheat in the microwave.

name: "slap yo mamma" spicy sticky asian ribs
description: spicy sticky asian ribs are drizzled in a sweet and spicy glaze, kissed to a slight crunch on the grill, and melt in your mouth, incredibly tender on the inside . these pork ribs are finger lickin' and slap yo mama silly kind of 'good'.
ingredients: 3.0 pound country style pork ribs, 0.2 cup white wine vinegar
steps: in a large pot filled halfway with water, add the vinegar and salt, and then boil . add the ribs and boil for 25 minutes.

name: make ahead turkey white wine rosemary garlic gravy
description: this genius recipe lets you make perfect, creamy and rich gravy ahead of time it tastes every bit as good as gravy made from the whole bird, but requires only about four wings and frees you from the last minute hassle . the recipe is a yummly original created by david bonom https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/david bonom .
ingredients: oil spray, 2.5 pound turkey wings, 2.0 teaspoon olive oil, 1.0 cup dry white wine, 5.0 cup unsalted chicken broth, 2.0 rosemary sprigs, 3.0 garlic cloves, 5.0 tablespoon unsalted butter, 5.0 tablespoon all purpose flour, 0.5 teaspoon salt, 0.2 teaspoon black pepper, 0.5 teaspoon salt, 0.2 teaspoon black pepper
steps: preheat oven to 425degf . coat a sheet pan with cooking oil spray or olive oil . place turkey wings on sheet pan and rub all over with oil . roast on middle rack of oven until wings are well browned, about 40 minutes . check to see that wings are done . carefully remove from oven or add time as needed . transfer turkey wings to a large saucepan or small dutch oven . pour off any fat that has accumulated on sheet pan . set sheet pan on a heatproof surface the stove or a work surface . pour wine onto sheet pan and stir to loosen browned bits . add broth, wine and browned bits from sheet pan, and rosemary to saucepan with turkey wings . bring to a boil over high heat . reduce heat to medium and gently simmer until reduced to 3 1/2 cups, about 45 minutes . strain broth through a fine strainer into large measuring cup . discard solids . mince garlic . melt butter in large saucepan over medium heat . add garlic and cook, stirring occasionally, until garlic starts to brown, 2 3 minutes . add flour, salt, and pepper, and cook, stirring constantly, 1 minute . whisk turkey broth into sauce and increase heat to medium high . bring mixture to a boil, whisking constantly . cook, whisking occasionally, until gravy thickens, about 2 minutes . remove from heat and season with salt and pepper . at this point, gravy can be cooled and stored in the refrigerator up to 3 days, or frozen up to 3 months . thaw gravy if necessary then, bring it to a boil and cook for 1 minute, stirring, before serving.

name: citrus vanilla blintzes
description: celebrate hanukkah with blintzes made with clover organic dairy products . clovercooks
ingredients: 4 clover large brown eggs, 1 cup flour, 1/4 cup sugar, 3/4 cup clover 2 reduced fat milk, 1/4 cup orange juice, 1 tsp vanilla, 1/2 tsp orange zest, pinch of salt, nonstick oil cooking spray, cooking oil with a high smoke point for frying grapeseed or peanut oil works best, clover cream on top vanilla yogurt optional topping, 1 cup clover low fat cottage cheese, 8 oz clover cream cheese, 1/4 cup sugar, 1 egg yolk, 1 tbsp orange juice, 1 tsp vanilla, 1/2 tsp orange zest, pinch of salt
steps: if starting the night before... place the clover low fat cottage cheese from the filling ingredients into a strainer lined with cheesecloth placed on top of a bowl . let the cottage cheese drain in the refrigerator overnight to remove excess liquid . if starting the same day... place the clover low fat cottage cheese from the filling ingredients into a double layer piece of cheesecloth . gather the cheesecloth into a bundle around the cottage cheese and squeeze gently and repeatedly to remove as much liquid as possible . blend all of the blintz batter ingredients together using a food processor, blender, immersion blender or electric hand mixer . consistency of the batter should be smooth no lumps . warm up a nonstick skillet on medium heat until hot . the skillet is ready when a drop of water sizzles on the surface of the pan . if the water pops or jumps out of the pan, the skillet is too hot let it cool slightly before starting . if the water sizzles, it's at the perfect temperature . grease the entire surface of the hot pan generously with nonstick cooking oil spray keep the oil spray away from gas stovetop flame . pour the blintz batter by 1/3 cupfuls into the pan, then tilt the pan in a circular motion till the batter coats the entire bottom of the pan in a large, thin circular shape.let each blintz cook for 60 75 seconds until the edges of the blintz brown and the bottom of the blintz is lightly golden . you can tell it's ready by touching the center of the pancake's surface it should be dry and slightly tacky to the touch . do not flip the blintz to cook the other side . use a spatula to take the blintz out of the pan and place it on a plate . keep the blintzes separated by pieces of parchment paper, wax paper, or paper towels . this will help keep them from sticking together . when all of the blintzes are cooked, create your filling . put all of the filling ingredients into a food processor and blend until smooth . alternatively, you can use a fork to mix all ingredients together . now you're going to stuff and wrap up your blintzes place a blintz browned side facing upward . put 3 tbsp of filling on the lower part of the browned blintz, about an inch from the edge . fold the lower edge of the blintz up over the filling . fold the sides of the blintz inward, as though you're folding an envelope . roll the blintz up and over the filling like a burrito, tucking the edges in as you roll . when the blintzes are stuffed and rolled, the less cooked side will be showing outside . now you are ready to fry them . pour 1/2 cup of frying oil into the skillet and heat over medium until hot . do not let the oil turn brown or start smoking if this happens, discard the oil and try again . cook the blintzes in batches of 3 this will give you space to turn them easily in the pan . carefully place the stuffed blintzes flap side down into the hot oil . the blintzes should fry for 1 to 2 minutes until they're brown and crispy . turn the blintzes carefully using a spatula and/or tongs, then fry for an additional 1 2 minutes . blintzes should be evenly browned on both sides.serve blintzes warm . they can be served as is or made extra special by topping with a dollop of clover cream on top vanilla yogurt.

name: lebanese green peas with rice
description: this recipe reminds me so much of home lebanon . it is one of those typical home cooked lebanese dishes that you wouldn't find in a lebanese restaurant menu . it is so rich in flavor, so healthy, and can be cooked without meat for those who are vegetarian . you can also substitute rice with quinoa . sahtein
ingredients: 3.0 cup frozen green peas, 200.0 gram ground beef, 1.0 onion, 3.0 garlic cloves, 2.0 large carrots, 1.0 bottle tomato juice, 1.0 can tomato paste, 1.0 tablespoon sugar, 1.0 pinch salt, 1.0 cube chicken broth, 1.0 juice, 10.0 gram butter, 2.0 tablespoon olive oil
steps: wash green peas in clean water, and set aside in a pot, add the butter, olive oil, and garlic and stir for 1 minute add onions and a pinch of salt and stir until translucent for about 5 minutes add the carrots and stir . leave for 10 minutes in a low heat and cover the pot add the meat, cube chicken, salt, pepper, cinnamon and nutmeg very little nutmeg . stir to combine, leave for around 10 minutes covered, stir occasionally . meanwhile, combine in a bowl the tomato juice, tomato paste, sugar . add the mixture to the pot, stir to combine, cover and let simmer for around 20 minutes add the lemon juice . stir, cover and let simmer for five minutes . serve with rice or quinoa

name: gluten free banana bread
description: soft banana bread made with wholesome gluten free flours comes together easily in one bowl . the recipe is a yummly original created by sara mellas https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/sara 20mellas .
ingredients: nonstick cooking spray, 2.0 bananas, 0.3 cup canola oil, 0.5 cup granulated sugar, 0.2 cup light brown sugar, 2.0 large eggs, 0.5 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1.0 cup brown rice flour, 0.5 cup oat flour, 2.0 tablespoon cornstarch, 1.0 teaspoon cinnamon, 1.0 teaspoon baking powder, 0.5 teaspoon baking soda, 0.5 teaspoon salt
steps: preheat the oven to 350degf . spray a 9x5 inch loaf pan with nonstick cooking spray . set aside . place the mashed bananas, canola oil, granulated sugar, brown sugar, eggs and vanilla extract in a large mixing bowl . whisk vigorously until smooth and combined . add the brown rice flour, oat flour, cornstarch, cinnamon, baking powder, baking soda, and salt to the bowl . continue whisking until the mixture is just combined . do not over mix . pour the batter into the loaf pan . bake the bread on middle rack of oven until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, 45 60 minutes . check to see that bread is done . remove from oven or add time as needed . allow the bread to rest in the pan for 10 minutes, then release the bread from the pan onto a cooling rack . allow to cool for at least 1 hour before slicing and serving . leftover bread may be stored in a large zip top bag at room temperature for 1 day, in the refrigerator for 4 days, or in the freezer for up to 3 months.

name: beef and barley soup
description: delicious in the winter, a delicious soup
ingredients: 2.0 tablespoon olive oil, onion, 2.0 teaspoon chopped garlic, 2.0 pound boneless chuck, 1.0 teaspoon salt, 0.1 teaspoon pepper, 2.0 carrots, 1.0 cup pearled barley, 8.0 cup beef broth, 1.5 cup frozen peas, 1.0 cup frozen corn
steps: heat oil in skillet on med high heat cook onion, garlic, beef, salt and pepper 7 10 min . until beef browned, stirring occasionally spoon into slow cooker, stir in carrots, barley and broth . cover and cook on low for 8 9 hours . turn to high and add frozen peas and corn, cook 10 minutes or until veggies are hot.

name: spiked strawberry slushies for a crowd
description: everybody loves a frozen cocktail, and these fruity slushies are sure to be a hit . made with fresh fruit, fruit juices, and only a modest amount of vodka, they're long on refreshing, the perfect sipper for a hot afternoon . the recipe is a yummly original created by sara mellas https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/sara 20mellas .
ingredients: 6.0 cup frozen strawberries, 1.5 cup pomegranate juice, 0.5 cup orange juice, 0.8 cup vodka, 0.2 cup agave nectar, 0.2 cup vodka, 1.0 tablespoon agave nectar
steps: combine the frozen strawberries, pomegranate juice, orange juice, vodka, and agave in a high powered blender . process on high until the mixture is smooth and icy, about 30 seconds . taste the slushies and blend in more vodka and agave nectar if desired . pour slushies into glasses and serve immediately.

name: eggs and tomato breakfast melts
description: easy open faced egg and tomato breakfast melts sandwiches made on whole wheat english muffin, egg whites and scallions, topped with tomatoes and melted cheese.
ingredients: 2 whole grain english muffins, 1 teaspoon olive oil, 8 egg whites, 4 scallions, kosher salt, black pepper, 2 oz about 1/2 cup reduced fat mexican cheese blend, grated, 1/2 cup grape or cherry heirloom tomatoes
steps: preheat the broiler on high . place muffins, cut side up, on a baking sheet and broil for 2 minutes or until beginning to lightly brown on edges . or you can do this in your toaster oven heat a medium skillet on medium heat . add oil and saute 3 of the scallions about 2 to 3 minutes . add the egg whites, season with salt and pepper and cook, mixing with a wooden spoon until cooked through . divide on toasted muffins and top with tomatoes, cheese and remaining scallions . broil for 1 to 1 1/2 minutes or until cheese has melted, careful not to burn.

name: mcdonald's egg mcmuffin baking with eda
description: full recipe http //www.bakingwithnyssaeda.com/2015/11/egg mcmuffin recipe.html
ingredients: 3.0 english muffins, 3.0 eggs, ground black pepper, salt, american cheese, bacon
steps: http //www.bakingwithnyssaeda.com/2015/11/egg mcmuffin recipe.html http //www.bakingwithnyssaeda.com/2015/11/egg mcmuffin recipe.html http //www.bakingwithnyssaeda.com/2015/11/egg mcmuffin recipe.html

name: brownie bowl sundaes
description: brownie bowl sundaes with brownie mix, breyers extra creamy vanilla, breyers hot fudge ice cream sauce, breyers caramel flavored ice cream sauce, breyers rainbow sprinkles
ingredients: 18.0 ounce brownie mix, 3.0 cup breyers extra creamy vanilla, 0.8 cup breyers hot fudge ice cream sauce, 0.8 cup breyers caramel flavored ice cream sauce, 0.2 cup breyers rainbow sprinkles
steps: preheat oven to 350deg . spray 12 cup muffin pan with no stick spray set aside . prepare brownie mix according to package directions pour into prepared muffin pan, filling cups about half full . bake 15 to 18 minutes until firm . cool in pan on wire rack 5 minutes, then remove from pans and cool completely . to make brownie cups, scoop out some of the center of brownies with a spoon . scoop breyers extra creamy vanilla into brownie cups, then drizzle with breyers hot fudge ice cream sauce and breyers caramel flavored ice cream sauce and top with breyers rainbow sprinkles . serve immediately.

name: skinny frozen hot chocolate
description: skinny frozen hot chocolate a dreamy, icy blend of chocolatey goodness, without the guilt
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups fat free milk, 1 cup ice, 4 tbsp ovaltine rich chocolate, 1 tbsp unsweetened cocoa powder, 2 tbsp fat free whipped topping, drop of peppermint extract
steps: pour the milk and ice into your blender . add in the ovaltine, cocoa powder, and whipped topping optional you could also leave this for the top instead . blend 3 4 minutes until the ice is completely chopped and the mixture is thick and icy . pour into two glasses, and serve immediately.

name: chicken sesame stir fry
description: chicken sesame stir fry with oil, sesame oil, foster farms boneless skinless chicken breasts, crushed red pepper flakes, minced garlic, ginger root, green onions, chicken broth, soy sauce, broccoli flowerettes, sugar, cornstarch, red wine vinegar
ingredients: 2.0 tablespoon oil, 1.0 tablespoon sesame oil, 1.5 pound foster farms boneless skinless chicken breasts, 0.5 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes, 1.0 teaspoon minced garlic, 1.0 tablespoon ginger root, 3.0 green onions, 1.0 cup chicken broth, 0.2 cup soy sauce, 1.0 pound broccoli flowerettes, 2.0 tablespoon sugar, 1.0 tablespoon cornstarch, 3.0 tablespoon red wine vinegar
steps: in skillet or wok, heat oils over medium high heat . saute chicken until cooked through remove to bowl . in drippings, saute pepper flakes, garlic, ginger and green onions for 2 minutes . add broth and soy sauce and bring to a boil . add broccoli and stir fry until crisp tender . remove broccoli . in a cup, blend sugar, cornstarch and vinegar and add to pan . boil 1 minute . return chicken and broccoli and heat through.

name: sweet and spicy peach pecan sundaes
description: sweet and spicy peach pecan sundaes with peaches, sugar, jelly, ground cinnamon, cayenne pepper, cookies, sweetened whipped cream, breyers peach ice cream
ingredients: 1.0 pound peaches, 0.3 cup sugar, 1.5 tablespoon jelly, 0.1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 0.1 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 8.0 cookies, 0.5 cup sweetened whipped cream, 2.0 cup breyers peach ice cream
steps: bring peaches, sugar, hot pepper jelly, cinnamon and cayenne pepper to a boil over medium heat in 2 quart saucepan . reduce heat to low and simmer, stirring frequently, until peaches release their juices and are heated through cool to room temperature . to serve, arrange 1 crumbled cookie into each serving dish . top with peach sauce, then breyers peach ice cream . sprinkle with remaining crumbled cookies then drizzle with remaining peach sauce . garnish with whipped cream.

name: stuffed jack o' lantern and jack o' peppers
description: if your pumpkin has a big neck, like mine, cut round slices from the top and make scary faces, using a sharp knife to make the mouth and three cloves to make eyes and nose...
ingredients: 2.0 tomatoes, 2.0 peppers, 1.0 orange pepper, 1.0 red pepper, 1.0 pumpkin, 0.8 ground meat, parsley, 2.0 carrots, 1.0 onion, 2.0 teaspoon fresh mint, 1.0 teaspoon oregano, 2.5 handful basmati rice, pepper, olive oil
steps: find directions on http //nomilktoday.co/2014/10/18/stuffed jack o lantern jack o peppers/

name: healthy garlicy sweet potato fries
description: the perfect nutrient dense side dish when you're craving something both sweet and savory the recipe is a yummly original created by sara mellas https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/sara 20mellas .
ingredients: 1.0 pound sweet potatoes, 1.0 tablespoon olive oil, 0.5 teaspoon salt, black pepper, 2.0 clove garlic
steps: preheat the oven to 425degf . line a large baking sheet with parchment paper . cut the sweet potatoes into wedges about 3/4 inch thick . place the sweet potatoes in a large mixing bowl . drizzle with olive oil, and sprinkle with salt and pepper, to taste . use a rubber spatula to toss the sweet potatoes until they are evenly coated . transfer the sweet potatoes to the prepared baking sheet with as much space between the wedges as possible . finely mince the garlic . roast on middle rack of oven for 12 minutes . carefully flip the sweet potatoes and sprinkle evenly with the minced garlic . continue roasting until the sweet potatoes are tender and slightly charred, 10 14 minutes . check to see that sweet potatoes are done . remove from oven or add time as needed . serve immediately.

name: instant pot deviled eggs
description: when it comes to making deviled eggs, i keep my ingredients pretty classic, but i love adding little pickle juice to my the yolks for a pop of flavor making hard boiled eggs in the instant pot will give you perfect, easier to peel eggs every time.
ingredients: 6 large eggs, 1 cup water, rack that comes with the instant pot, 2 tablespoons mayonaisse, 1 tablespoon 2 milk, 1 teaspoon dill pickle juice, 1/8 teaspoon salt, fresh black pepper, paprika for sprinkling, fresh dill
steps: place the rack in the bottom of the pot . pour the water in the pot . place the eggs on the rack . high pressure on manual 5 minutes . natural release 5 minutes then use quick release, then quickly run the eggs under cold running water until cool enough to hold . peel the eggs and slice in half lengthwise . remove yolks and transfer to a medium sized bowl . add the mayo, milk, pickle juice, salt, pepper then use a fork to mash well . spoon filling into each egg white . sprinkle with paprika, dill and serve.

name: lemon dill schmear
description: learn the history of cream cheese and try a recipe for lemon dill schmear a lemony herb cream cheese spread . bagels, schmear, dairy, kosher.
ingredients: 1 lb cream cheese, softened, 3 tbsp fresh lemon juice, or more to taste, 1 tbsp heavy whipping cream, or more for consistency, 1 tsp lemon zest, 3 tbsp chopped fresh dill, salt and white pepper to taste
steps: fit your food processor with a blade attachment . place cream cheese, lemon juice, whipping cream, lemon zest, and dill into the processor . process to blend all ingredients until a creamy, smooth texture develops . you may add more whipping cream if desired this will soften the texture and make it more dip like . after processing, taste the schmear add more lemon juice, salt, and white pepper to taste, if desired . chill the schmear until ready to serve . garnish with a lemon twist, if desired instructions can be found here . spread on toasted bagels or crackers.

name: italian grilled chicken and grape tomato salad
description: italian grilled chicken and grape tomato salad with wish bone romano basil vinaigrette dressing, boneless, skinless chicken breast halves, torn romaine lettuce leaves, grape tomatoes, grated parmesan cheese, italian seasoned croutons
ingredients: 1.0 cup wish bone romano basil vinaigrette dressing, 4.0 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves, 6.0 cup torn romaine lettuce leaves, 1.0 cup grape tomatoes, 0.2 cup grated parmesan cheese, 0.5 cup italian seasoned croutons
steps: pour 1/2 cup wish bone romano basil vinaigrette dressing over chicken in large, shallow nonaluminum baking dish or plastic bag turn to coat . cover, or close bag, and marinate in refrigerator, turning occasionally, 30 minutes to 3 hours . remove chicken from marinade, discarding marinade . grill or broil chicken, turning once and brushing with 1/4 cup dressing, 12 minutes or until chicken is thoroughly cooked . toss romaine with remaining 1/4 cup dressing in large serving bowl . top with sliced chicken, tomatoes, cheese and croutons . serve, if desired, with freshly ground black pepper and additional dressing.

name: nyc deli salmon mousse dip
description: nyc deli salmon mousse dip with hellmann' or best food real mayonnais, cream cheese, snip fresh dill, lemon juice, purple onion, capers, smoked salmon
ingredients: 2.0 tablespoon hellmann' or best food real mayonnais, 8.0 ounce cream cheese, 1.0 tablespoon snip fresh dill, 2.0 teaspoon lemon juice, 0.2 cup purple onion, 1.0 teaspoon capers, 3.0 ounce smoked salmon
steps: combine hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise, cream cheese, dill and lemon juice in medium bowl until smooth . gently stir in onion, capers and salmon . cover and refrigerate until ready to use . serve, if desired, with bagel chips, crackers and/or assorted vegetables.

name: mediterranean potato and green bean salad
description: mediterranean potato and green bean salad with red potatoes, green beans, wish bone balsamic vinaigrette dressing, red bell pepper
ingredients: 2.0 pound red potatoes, 0.5 pound green beans, 0.5 cup wish bone balsamic vinaigrette dressing, 1.0 red bell pepper
steps: cover potatoes with water in 4 quart saucepot, adding salt, if desired . bring to a boil over high heat . reduce heat to low and simmer 8 minutes . add green beans and simmer 5 minutes or until potatoes are tender . drain and rinse with cold water until completely cool . in large bowl, combine all ingredients . serve chilled or at room temperature and, if desired, on green leaf lettuce.

name: turkey santa fe lettuce wraps
description: these santa fe turkey lettuce wraps are so good, you'll want to save some leftover turkey just to make them or leftover chicken breast would work too
ingredients: 1 tsp olive oil, 1/4 cup minced red bell peppers, 1/4 cup minced scallions, 12 oz leftover turkey breast, 2/3 cup frozen corn, 1/2 cup canned black beans, 1/2 cup frozen spinach, 2 tbsp diced jarred jalapeno peppers, 1 teaspoon cumin, 1 teaspoon chili powder, 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, 1 cup reduced fat shredded mexican cheese blend, 8 large iceburg lettuce leaves, 12 tbsp avocado cilantro ranch dressing
steps: heat the oil in a large skillet over medium high heat . add the red bell pepper and scallions to the pan and saute for 2 minutes until tender . add the diced turkey, corn, black beans, spinach, jalapeno peppers, cumin, chili powder, salt, and cayenne pepper to the pan . cook for another 3 to 4 minutes, stirring well so the spinach gets mixed in with everything . place about 1/3 cup of turkey mixture in the center of each lettuce leaf . top each wrap with 2 tbsp cheese and 1 1/2 tbsp avocado sauce if desired.

name: baked sweet potato skins
description: these cheesy baked sweet potato skins are loaded with fat free black refried beans, salsa and cheddar cheese . just a few ingredients but they taste so good
ingredients: 6 small sweet potatoes, olive oil cooking spray, 1/2 tablespoon taco seasoning, 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt, freshly ground black pepper, 1 cup fat free refried black beans, 3/4 cup salsa, 3/4 cup shredded reduced fat cheddar, 2 scallions, 1 tablespoons chopped cilantro
steps: preheat oven to 400 degrees f . adjust oven rack to center of oven . place whole sweet potatoes on a sheet pan covered in foil or parchment, poke each a few times with a fork . bake until fork tender, 40 45 minutes . allow to cool for 10 minutes . switch oven from bake to broil . meanwhile in a small bowl combine black beans with taco seasoning . cut sweet potatoes in half and carefully scoop out flesh with a metal spoon, leaving about 1/4 inch of flesh intact . place potatoes, skin side up back on the sheet pan, spray with olive oil, top with pinch salt and pepper, and broil for 2 to 3 minutes . remove skins from oven, turn over and fill each with black beans, 1 tbsp salsa and 1 tbsp cheese then return to oven to broil 2 minutes more . top with each skin with scallions and cilantro and eat right away.

name: greek chicken burgers
description: greek chicken burgers a lighter recipe that's popping with garden flavors, smothered in a feta and dill yogurt sauce, and topped with sweet red peppers.
ingredients: 1.0 pound ground chicken, 1.5 cup fresh spinach, 0.1 cup red onion, 2.0 tablespoon fronds, 1.0 tablespoon minced garlic, 0.3 cup feta crumbles, 1.0 tablespoon worcestershire sauce, 0.2 teaspoon salt, cracked pepper, 1.0 tablespoon olive oil, 4.0 burger buns, 1.0 roasted red pepper, feta, 1.0 cup greek yogurt, 0.5 cup feta crumbles, 1.0 tablespoon dill, 1.0 tablespoon fresh lemon juice, 0.1 teaspoon salt, cracked pepper
steps: for a full set of directions go to http //simpleseasonal.com/recipes/sandwiches/greek chicken burgers

name: onrainkajino /com992.com/ kajinojuso ss saseolbakaracuceon emkajino
description: kajinocuceon /com992.com/ kajinojuso kajinocuceon kajinosaiteu saseolbakaracuceon onrainbakara bakarasaiteu saseolkajinocuceon maseuteokajino inteonesbakara bakarasaiteu /com992.com/ weoldeukajino inteoneskajino bakarasaiteu emkajino bakaracuceon saseolbakaracuceon ju saseolkajino saseolbakarasaiteu kajinosaiteu kajinocuceon /com992.com/ kajinojuso kajinocuceon kajinosaiteu saseolbakaracuceon onrainbakara bakarasaiteu saseolkajinocuceon maseuteokajino inteonesbakara bakarasaiteu /com992.com/ weoldeukajino inteoneskajino bakarasaiteu emkajino bakaracuceon saseolbakaracuceon ju saseolkajino saseolbakarasaiteu kajinosaiteu gogaegsenteoneun 24sigan daegijungimyeo 070 7847 5879 ro yeonragjusimyeon deougdeo jasehan naeyong sangdam ganeunghasibnida . kajinosaiteu kajinojuso kajinocuceon bakarasaiteu bakarajuso bakaracuceon saseolkajino saseolbakara maseuteokajino saseolkajinosaiteu saseolbakarasaiteu

name: flourless peanut butter chocolate chip cookies
description: here is a great recipe for soft and chewy flourless peanut butter chocolate chip cookies.
ingredients: 0.5 teaspoon baking soda, 0.2 teaspoon fine sea salt, 1.0 egg, 0.5 cup light brown sugar, 0.8 cup all natural peanut butter, 0.5 cup mini chocolate chips
steps: preheat the oven to 350degf . line a sheet pan with parchment paper and set aside . place the baking soda, salt, and egg in a large mixing bowl and whisk together until lightly frothy . add in the brown sugar and whisk until smooth . add in the peanut butter, 1/4 cup at a time, and mix with a spoon until well combined and a dough forms . fold in the chocolate chips . to form cookies about 12 per batch, scoop a tablespoon of dough onto the prepared sheet pan . repeat with the remaining dough . lightly push the top of the dough down to flatten it slightly . bake the cookies until the tops are crinkled and the bottoms are golden brown, about 9 minutes . check to see that cookies are done . remove from oven or add time as needed . allow the cookies to cool completely on the sheet pan . serve when cooled.

name: artichokes in a curry ginger sauce
description: get a taste of india if you love foods with a zing, then this recipe is for you . this is a great way to eat artichokes if you don't like them, as the flavor is greatly masked by the onion, cloves, curry, and ginger . add more curry if you can stand the heat.
ingredients: vegetable oil, 0.5 onion, 1.0 garlic clove, 8.0 ounce artichoke hearts, 1.0 tablespoon flour, 200.0 milliliter chicken stock, 1.0 tablespoon curry powder, ground ginger
steps: saute the onion and garlic in a tablespoon of oil . once translucent, add the drained and halved artichokes . after 3 minutes, add the flour . cook for 1 minute, and add the stock . add the curry powder and a pinch of ginger and simmer 5 minutes.

name: all choco cookies
description: chocolate brings joy and laughter to any occasion . these all choco cookies are guaranteed to satisfy the sweet tooth and create a celebration anywhere they are served . this recipe combines dark chocolate with milk chocolate for a dreamy and creamy cookie that will melt in your mouth . you might want to make a double or triple batch and invite your friends over for an afternoon if gossip, laughter, coffee and cookies they will love you for it.
ingredients: 1.0 egg, 100.0 gram flour, 100.0 gram butter, 80.0 gram brown sugar, 100.0 gram dark chocolate, 80.0 gram milk chocolate, 0.5 teaspoon baking powder, 1.0 teaspoon vanilla flavored sugar, salt
steps: preheat oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit . melt the dark chocolate in a double boiler with 2 tablespoons of water . in a bowl, mix brown sugar, vanilla flavored sugar, egg, flour, baking powder, and a pinch of salt . melt the butter in the microwave, then stir into sugar mixture . add melted chocolate and mix . chop milk chocolate into small chunks, then add to the dough, folding to combine . form small heaps of dough on a silicone mat or parchment paper lined pan . bake for 10 to 15 minutes.

name: skinny apple cobbler
description: none
ingredients: 2 1/2 lbs gala apples, 1/2 cup honey, 2 tbsp cornstarch, 1/2 tsp cinnamon, 1/4 tsp nutmeg, pinch of salt, 2 tbsp fresh lemon juice, 1/2 cup water, 1/4 cup king arthur white whole wheat flour, 1/4 cup king arthur all purpose flour, 2 tbsp granulated sugar, 1/2 tsp baking powder, 1/4 tsp baking soda, 2 tbsp chilled whipped butter, 1/3 cup low fat buttermilk, 1 tbsp canola oil, 1 tsp light brown sugar
steps: in a large heavy pot, combine all of the apple filling ingredients and simmer on low heat for about 25 minutes, gently stirring occasionally until the apples are soft . divide warm apples into 6 8 oz ramekins . preheat the oven to 400deg . in a medium bowl, whisk flours, granulated sugar, baking powder, baking soda and salt . cut in chilled butter must be cold using a pastry cutter or 2 knives until pebble sized pieces are formed . in a small bowl combine buttermilk and oil mix well . add to the dry mixture and mix until just moistened, careful not to over mix . spoon the batter over the apples in the ramekins . sprinkle with brown sugar and bake 30 minutes, until apples are bubbling and the topping is golden . let it stand 8 to 10 minutes before eating.

name: philly cheesesteak stuffed portobello mushrooms
description: it doesn't get much better than a low carb, philly cheesesteak stuffed in a portobello mushroom steak and mushrooms work so well together, so why not make stuff them with this cheesy deliciousness
ingredients: 6 ounces thin sliced sirloin steaks, 1/8 teaspoon kosher salt, black pepper to taste, cooking spray, 3/4 cup diced onion, 3/4 cup diced green pepper, 1/4 cup light sour cream, 2 tablespoons light mayonnaise, 2 oz light cream cheese, 3 oz shredded mild provolone cheese, 4 medium portobello mushrooms
steps: preheat the oven to 400f . spray a baking sheet with oil . gently remove the stems, scoop out the gills and spray the tops of the mushrooms with oil, season with 1/8 tsp salt and fresh pepper . season steak with salt and pepper on both sides . spray a large skillet with cooking spray and heat on high, let the pan get very hot then add the steak and cook on high heat about 1 to 1 1/2 minutes on each side, until cooked through . transfer to a cutting board and slice thin, set aside . reduce the heat to medium low, spray with more oil and saute onions and peppers 5 to 6 minutes, until soft . combine all the ingredients in a medium bowl . transfer to the mushroom caps, about 1/2 cup each . bake in the oven until the cheese is melted and the mushrooms are tender, about 20 minutes.

name: tropical mango blueberry lassi
description: tropical lassi is a healthy, indian yogurt drink blended with frozen mango, tart blueberries and spices.
ingredients: 1/2 cup fresh or frozen blueberries, 1/2 cup frozen mango chunks, 1/4 teaspoon lime zest, 1/2 cup organic plain fat free stonyfield yogurt, 6 almonds, 3/4 cup almond milk, or milk of choice, 1 handful ice, 1/8 teaspoon ground cinnamon
steps: combine all the ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth.

name: sun dried tomato walnut pesto
description: uses kitchenaid k400 blender https //www.kitchenaid.com/countertop appliances/blenders/blender products/p.k400 blender.ksb4027bm.html .
ingredients: 0.5 cup extra virgin olive oil, 1.0 cup sun dried tomatoes, 1.0 cup basil leaves, 0.5 cup raw walnuts, 1.0 teaspoon minced fresh garlic, 0.3 cup grated parmesan, 0.2 teaspoon sea salt, 1.0 pinch red pepper flakes
steps: throw the ingredients into your kitchenaid blender in the order listed . secure the lid, remove the center lid cap, and insert the tamper . blend on high for 30 to 60 seconds using the tamper to guide the ingredients through the blades until well combined and to your desired consistency . you may need to stop the machine and scrape down the sides of the container . serve with cooked pasta or spiralized noodles as a dip with crackers, bread, or crudites or slathered on sandwiches and wraps.

name: slow cooker brisket with chipotle cranberry sauce
description: learn to make a slow cooker brisket for passover inspired by mexican flavors from cheryl lee chipotle peppers for smoky heat and dried cranberries for sweetness.
ingredients: 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp dried mexican oregano, 1 tsp dried thyme, 1 1/2 tsp sea salt, 5 6 lbs beef brisket, 1 sweet onion, thinly sliced, 6 cloves garlic, peeled, 1 cup red wine, 1 2 dried chipotle chile, 1 cup dried cranberries, divided, cilantro
steps: mix the cumin, oregano, thyme and salt together in a small bowl . rub the spices over the entire brisket and let marinate for 8 24 hours . in a large slow cooker, layer the onions, garlic, and chipotle, then place the brisket on top . pour the wine over the brisket, then sprinkle 1/3 cup dried cranberries on top . set the slow cooker to high and the timer to 6 hours . turn the brisket over after 5 hours, making sure that the cranberries are immersed in the liquid . when the brisket is done, remove it from the slow cooker to a plate . pour the remaining ingredients from the slow cooker into a food processor or blender and puree until smooth . pour the puree into a small pan . using either water or broth, thin the puree out to a thinner, sauce consistency . add the remaining 2/3 cup dried cranberries and let them warm and plump in the sauce . adjust the seasoning to taste, if needed . slice the brisket thinly, and ladle a some sauce onto the slices . serve the remaining sauce on the side . garnish with chopped fresh cilantro if desired.

name: gebakken bananen van de bbq met 3 chocolade ijs
description: dit toetje met chocolade ijs en banaan van de barbecue maken dat het een prima zomers gerecht is . chocolade maken is niet nodig, dat zit al in het ijs van deze gebakken bananen van de bbq met 3 chocolade ijs.
ingredients: 2.0 bananen, 1.0 tablespoon citroensap, 1.0 teaspoon honing, 15.0 gram suiker, 25.0 tablespoon blue band vloeibaar light, 1.0 container hertog 3 chocolades
steps: laat de banaan in de schil zitten . snijd de banaan in de lengte doormidden . leg elke halve banaan op een stuk aluminiumfolie en verdeel de vloeibare boter, de suiker, het citroensap en de honing over de bananen . vouw nu het aluminiumfolie stevig om elke banaan heen . barbecue nu de ingepakte bananen 15 minuten zodat ze lekker zacht worden en de suiker goed kan smelten . leg de pakketjes op de borden, vouw voorzichtig open en schep er bol hertog 3 chocolade ijs bij.

name: honey roasted turkey sandwich
description: honey roasted turkey sandwich with hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise, wheat bread, roasted turkey breast, sharp cheddar cheese, romaine lettuce leaves, green grapes
ingredients: 1.0 tablespoon hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise, 2.0 slice wheat bread, 2.0 ounce roasted turkey breast, 1.0 slice sharp cheddar cheese, 2.0 romaine lettuce leaves, 0.2 cup green grapes
steps: spread hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise on 1 bread slice, then sprinkle with grapes . top with turkey, cheddar and lettuce, then remaining bread slice.

name: 5 ingredient garlic roasted asparagus
description: garlic brings out the savory flavors in this easy asparagus side dish . the recipe is a yummly original created by edwina clark https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/edwina clark .
ingredients: 2.0 clove garlic, 1.2 pound asparagus, 1.0 tablespoon olive oil, 0.5 teaspoon salt, black pepper
steps: preheat the oven to 400degf . line a large baking sheet with parchment paper . crush and finely mince the garlic . trim the rough ends from the asparagus spears, and arrange on the baking sheet . drizzle the asparagus with olive oil, and sprinkle with salt, black pepper, and minced garlic . roast on middle rack of oven until the garlic is fragrant, and asparagus is crisp tender, 10 12 minutes . check to see that asparagus is done . remove from oven or add time as needed . serve immediately.

name: spaghetti met knoflooksaus, courgette, kip en uitjes
description: een geheel italiaanse spaghetti met knoflooksaus, courgette, kip en uitjes . de kip combineert zalig met de pastasaus knoflook van bertolli.
ingredients: 400.0 gram spaghetti, 2.0 courgette, 3.0 tablespoon bertolli vloeibaar voor koken, bakken en roerbakken, 300.0 gram ree, 4.0 tablespoon zilveruitjes, 1.0 bag bertolli pastasaus knoflook, 2.0 sprig peterselie
steps: kook de bertolli pasta spaghetti volgens de aanwijzingen op de verpakking . giet de spaghetti af . snijd de courgettes ondertussen in dikke plakken en de plakken in vieren . verhit bertolli vloeibaar in een ruime koekenpan of wok en bak hierin de kipreepjes 5 min . op een hoog vuur . bestrooi de kip met wat zout en peper . voeg de courgette toe en bak deze nog 5 min . mee . roer het mengsel geregeld om . voeg de zilveruitjes en de bertolli pastasaus knoflook toe en verwarm de saus 5 min . op een matig vuur . hak de peterselie fijn . verdeel de spaghetti over 4 warme diepe borden . schep de saus erover en bestrooi het gerecht met de peterselie.

name: mustard herb crusted pork loin roast
description: cook once and eat twice serve half of this savory pork roast with steamed mixed baby vegetables and a wild rice pilaf for the first meal, and use the leftover roast for the pork cordon bleu sandwiches as a second meal.
ingredients: 1.5 pound new york top loin pork roast, 1.0 cup panko breadcrumbs, 0.2 teaspoon salt, 0.1 teaspoon black pepper, 1.0 egg yolks, 2.0 tablespoon dijon, 1.5 teaspoon fresh thyme
steps: heat oven to 350 degrees f . place panko on large dinner plate set aside . pat surface of pork dry with paper towels sprinkle with salt and pepper . combine egg yolk, mustard and thyme in pie plate . roll pork roast in mustard mixture, spreading mixture evenly on surface . then roll mustard coated roast in panko, patting panko on roast to evenly cover . place roast on rack in shallow roasting pan . roast, uncovered, in heated oven for 30 45 minutes or until an instant read thermometer inserted near center reads 145 degrees f . loosely cover pork with foil . let rest for 5 10 minutes . transfer pork roast to carving board cut half of the pork roast into 1/2 inch thick slices to serve . cool remaining piece of roast at room temperature for up to 1 hour . loosely cover and refrigerate for sandwiches . serves 4 with leftovers for sandwiches.

name: 5 minute crock pot burritos
description: 5 minute crock pot burritos with pork sirloin roast, southwest seasoning, chunky salsa, flour tortillas, cheddar cheese, fresh cilantro
ingredients: 3.0 pound pork sirloin roast, 2.0 teaspoon southwest seasoning, 3.0 cup chunky salsa, 10.0 flour tortillas, 1.0 cup cheddar cheese, 1.0 tablespoon fresh cilantro
steps: rub southwest seasoning on both sides of pork place in slow cooker . pour 2 cups salsa over pork cover and cook on low for 6 to 8 hours . using two forks, shred pork . meanwhile, wrap tortillas in aluminum foil heat in a 350 degree f . oven for 20 minutes or until heated through . spoon pork mixture onto center of each tortilla top with additional salsa, cheese and cilantro . broil 1 minute or until cheese is bubbly . roll up like a burrito to eat . serve with black beans and spanish rice.

name: one bowl pumpkin sheet cake with chocolate bourbon buttercream
description: move over thanksgiving pies, there's a new holiday dessert in town . while still paying homage to fall's beloved pumpkin, this easy peasy dessert gives the cake lovers at the table not to mention the chocolate lovers something pretty special to celebrate with . as you'd expect with a pumpkin dessert, the cake is nice and moist, and the generous spices make an intriguing and delicious combination with the chocolate . the recipe is a yummly original created by jessie sheehan https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/jessie sheehan .
ingredients: cooking oil spray, all purpose flour, 1.0 cup vegetable oil, 1.5 cup light brown sugar, 1.0 cup granulated sugar, 1.0 tablespoon vanilla extract, 2.0 large eggs, 2.0 large egg yolks, 1.0 can pumpkin puree, 1.5 cup all purpose flour, 1.5 cup cake flour, 2.0 teaspoon baking powder, 0.2 teaspoon baking soda, 1.0 teaspoon salt, 2.0 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 0.8 teaspoon ground ginger, 0.5 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 1.0 cup unsalted butter, 4.0 cup confectioners sugar, 0.5 teaspoon salt, 1.0 cup unsweetened dutch process cocoa powder, 5.0 tablespoon bourbon, 0.2 cup heavy cream, 1.0 tablespoon vanilla extract
steps: preheat oven to 350degf . grease pan with cooking oil spray or butter . line with parchment paper or dust with flour, shaking out excess set pan aside . put oil, brown sugar, granulated sugar, and vanilla in stand mixer bowl or mixing bowl and whisk to combine . pro tip you'll be making cake batter and frosting in the same bowl, so if you'll be using a stand mixer, start with the bowl here even though you're not using the mixer just yet . add eggs and yolks, 1 at a time, whisking after each addition . add pumpkin puree and whisk until blended . put a sheet of parchment paper or a large plate on a work surface and sift flours, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and spices onto it, using a sifter or fine strainer . use paper to pour dry ingredients into wet in 3 additions or scrape ingredients from plate, folding them into batter until blended . do not overmix . pro tip out of cake flour you can use more all purpose, though the cake won't have quite as light a crumb . thoroughly scrape batter into prepared pan and smooth top with a flexible spatula . pro tip scrape bowl well, as you will be reusing it to make frosting . wipe with a paper towel if necessary . bake cake on middle rack of oven for 20 minutes . rotate pan and bake until a toothpick inserted in center of cake comes out with a moist crumb or two, 15 20 more minutes . check to see that cake is done . remove from oven or add time as needed . set pan on a cooling rack . when cake is cool enough to handle, about 30 minutes, invert cake onto a serving platter to cool completely . meanwhile, make frosting . put butter in stand mixer bowl . mix on medium speed until butter is smooth, scraping bowl as needed . put a sheet of parchment or a large plate on a work surface and sift sugar, salt, and cocoa powder onto it . use paper to pour dry ingredients into butter a little at a time or scrape some at a time from plate, mixing on low speed to incorporate between each addition . pro tip we love dutch process cocoa powder for its deep dark color and flavor, but in a pinch, regular unsweetened cocoa powder will work instead . add bourbon and then cream, beating on medium speed and scraping bowl as needed . add vanilla and beat on medium speed until frosting is light and fluffy, 3 5 minutes . cover bowl and set frosting aside until cake is cool . tuck strips of parchment paper or waxed paper under cake to keep platter clean while you frost . generously spread cake with frosting, leaving sides bare if you like . carefully pull out strips of parchment . pro tip yes, it's a lot of frosting for a cake that's a little less decadent, use as much frosting as you like, then refrigerate the rest in an airtight container up to 3 weeks or freeze it up to 2 months . cut cake into slices and serve . store leftovers at room temperature loosely wrapped in plastic wrap or draped in parchment paper for up to 3 days.

name: chicken parmesan pasta cups
description: breaded chicken nuggets topped on a bed of angel hair pasta baked in cups with garlic tomato sauce with mozzarella and parmesan cheeses.
ingredients: 1.0 bag tyson premium selects breaded chicken nuggets, 0.5 box angel hair pasta, 2.0 cup prepared garlic tomato sauce, 2.0 eggs, 2.0 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, 0.5 cup shredded parmesan cheese
steps: prepare nuggets according to microwave instructions, set aside . preheat oven to 350degf . combine the pasta, 1 cup tomato sauce, eggs and 1 cup mozzarella cheese in a mixing bowl and divide the pasta into a well oiled muffin tin 12 hole . you may not use all the pasta in the first cooking round cover and refrigerate until the next cook . place the pasta into the oven and cook for 20 minutes . remove from the oven and place the nuggets on top of each of the pasta cups . divide tomato reserved sauce over the top of the nuggets and finish with the reserved mozzarella cheese and parmesan . place back into the oven for an additional 10 minutes or until the pasta is set like a cup and the cheese is melty and golden brown.

name: holiday breakfast casserole
description: holiday breakfast casserole with breakfast sausage links, english muffins, butter, cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, onion, red pepper, large eggs, milk, salt, bacon bits
ingredients: 2.0 package breakfast sausage links, 6.0 english muffins, 0.2 cup butter, 1.0 cup cheddar cheese, 1.0 cup mozzarella cheese, 0.5 cup onion, 0.5 cup red pepper, 12.0 large eggs, 2.0 cup milk, 0.2 teaspoon salt, 0.2 cup bacon bits
steps: cook sausage according to package directions . cool slightly cut 1/4 inch coin sized pieces . in a greased 9 x 13 inch baking dish, layer half english muffin cubes and half cooked sausage repeat layers . drizzle with butter and top with the cheese, onion and red pepper . in a large bowl, combine the eggs, milk, salt and pepper pour over casserole . sprinkle with bacon cover and refrigerate overnight . remove from refrigerator 30 minutes before baking . uncover and bake at 350 f for 45 to 50 minutes, or until a knife inserted into the center comes out clean let stand 5 minutes.

name: cherry cheesecake shooters
description: learn to make easy, tasty cheesecake desserts with cherries, almonds and a graham cracker base.
ingredients: 24 oz frozen pitted sweet cherries, 1/4 cup honey, 1/4 cup whiskey, 1/4 cup butter, 1 tsp cornstarch, juice of 1/2 lemon, 16 oz cream cheese, softened, 14 oz sweetened condensed milk, 12 graham crackers, 1/4 cup sliced almonds
steps: in a medium saucepan, combine the cherries, honey and whiskey over medium heat and mix to combine . add the butter and continue cooking until the cherries are hot and bubbly . in a separate dish, whisk together the cornstarch and lemon juice . add cornstarch mixture to the cherries and cook for 2 additional minutes, stirring until the mixture is nice and thick . remove from heat and transfer the cherries to a bowl . refrigerate until they're totally chilled and thick . in a stand mixer fit with the whisk attachment, whip the cream cheese and condensed milk until fluffy.place the mixture into a pastry bag or plastic zipper bag with a medium hole snipped off the end . store in a bowl in the refrigerator until ready to use.place the graham crackers into a large storage bag and crush them into fine crumbs.

name: zuurkool stamppot met rookworst
description: een recept voor een heerlijke zuurkool stamppot met rookworst . gemakkelijk te bereiden voor vier personen.
ingredients: 750.0 gram zuurkool, 1.0 kilogram aardappels, 2.0 deciliter vleesbouillon, 150.0 gram spekblokjes, 1.0 ui, 3.0 deciliter melk, 285.0 gram unox gelderse rookworst, zout, peper
steps: schil de aardappels en snijd deze in stukjes . knijp de zuurkool wat uit en trek het los . bewaar een flinke lepel zuurkool en doe de rest van de zuurkool met de aardappelstukjes in de vleesbouillon . voeg nog wat peper en zout naar smaak toe en laat het geheel 25 minuten sudderen . bak ondertussen het spek uit en fruit de ui in het spekvet . stamp het zuurkool/aardappel mengsel fijn en voeg de verwarmde melk toe . voeg vervolgens het spek en de uien toe . schep als laatste het achtergehouden, fijngesneden, zuurkool erdoor heen . bereid de unox rookworst volgens aanwijzing op de verpakking en serveer deze bij de zuurkool stamppot . eet smakelijk

name: petite crust less quiche
description: these petite crustless quiches are so good, loaded with turkey kielbasa, veggies and cheese . a perfect make ahead breakfast for meal prep and naturally gluten free
ingredients: olive oil spray, 1 tbsp olive oil, 1/2 medium onion, 1/3 cup chopped bell pepper, 2 garlic cloves, 1 medium tomato, 6 oz turkey kielbasa, 2 cups baby spinach, 5 large whole eggs, 4 large egg whites, 1/3 cup fat free milk, 1/3 cup all purpose flour, 1/2 tsp salt, 1/8 tsp black pepper, 3 oz shredded cheddar cheese, for gluten free use gf all purpose flour.
steps: preheat oven to 350degf . spray a nonstick muffin pan with olive oil spray . heat the oil in a large non stick skillet over medium heat . saute onions and salt for 5 minutes, until soft, add bell peppers, garlic, tomato, kielbasa saute for another 5 to 7 minutes . add spinach and cook until wilted, about 1 minute . set aside . meanwhile, in a large bowl, whisk the eggs, egg whites, milk, flour, salt and pepper until smooth . add the cheese and cooked kielbasa mixture to the bowl and mix well . pour into the prepared muffin pan and bake for 28 to 30 minutes, or until firm.

name: pizza cup snacks
description: pizza cup snacks with refrigerated biscuits, ground beef, , shredded mozzarella cheese
ingredients: 1.0 can refrigerated biscuits, 0.5 pound ground beef, 1.0 jar none, 0.5 cup shredded mozzarella cheese
steps: preheat oven to 375deg . evenly press each biscuit in bottom and up sides of each cup in 12 cup muffin pan chill until ready to fill . brown ground beef in 10 inch skillet over medium high heat drain . stir in sauce and heat through . evenly spoon beef mixture into prepared muffin cups . bake 15 minutes . evenly sprinkle beef mixture with cheese and bake an additional 5 minutes or until cheese is melted and biscuits are golden . let stand 5 minutes before serving . gently remove pizza cups from muffin pan and serve.

name: last lap honey mustard chicken fingers
description: last lap honey mustard chicken fingers with hellmann's or best foods light mayonnaise, hellmann's or best foods dijonnaise creamy dijon mustard, honey, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, corn flakes
ingredients: 6.0 tablespoon hellmann's or best foods light mayonnaise, 1.0 tablespoon hellmann's or best foods dijonnaise creamy dijon mustard, 2.0 tablespoon honey, 1.0 pound boneless skinless chicken breast halves, 1.5 cup corn flakes
steps: preheat oven to 425deg . combine hellmann's or best foods light mayonnaise, creamy dijon mustard and honey in medium bowl reserve 1/2 for dipping . add chicken to remaining mayonnaise mixture stir to coat, then roll in crumbs . bake 10 minutes or until chicken is thoroughly cooked . serve with reserved honey mustard sauce.

name: grilled romaine with miso butter
description: grilled romaine with miso butter with romaine, olive oil, chopped peanuts, lemon zest, butter, white miso paste, olive oil, fresh lemon juice, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh parsley
ingredients: 2.0 head romaine, olive oil, 0.2 cup chopped peanuts, lemon zest, 3.0 tablespoon butter, 2.0 tablespoon white miso paste, 2.0 tablespoon olive oil, 1.0 tablespoon fresh lemon juice, 0.2 teaspoon sea salt, 0.2 teaspoon fresh ground black pepper, 1.0 teaspoon fresh parsley
steps: place the smart oven grill attachment in oven . select grill mode and preheat grill to high heat setting . in small bowl, combine all ingredients with a fork . set aside until ready to use . brush cut side of romaine lightly with olive oil . grill, cut side down on preheated grill for 3 5 minutes, until edges are charred and romaine is crisp tender . remove from grill with tongs and arrange on serving platter . drizzle with miso butter, sprinkle with peanuts and dust with fresh lemon zest.

name: caesar sandwich
description: caesar sandwich with cooked pork roast, romaine lettuce, caesar salad dressing, parmesan cheese, focaccia bread
ingredients: 0.8 pound cooked pork roast, 3.0 cup romaine lettuce, 0.5 cup caesar salad dressing, 0.2 cup parmesan cheese, 1.0 focaccia bread
steps: toss lettuce with dressing and cheese, set aside . slice focaccia horizontally cut into 4 wedges . layer pork and then lettuce on focaccia bottoms . place focaccia tops over lettuce.

name: chocolate creme brulee
description: chocolate creme brulee with heavy cream, semisweet chocolate, vanilla, egg yolks, sugar, granulated sugar, light brown sugar
ingredients: 2.0 cup heavy cream, 3.0 ounce semisweet chocolate, 1.5 teaspoon vanilla, 5.0 egg yolks, 5.0 tablespoon sugar, 2.0 tablespoon granulated sugar, 2.0 tablespoon light brown sugar
steps: preheat oven 250 heat cream over medium heat bring to simmer remove from heat add chocolate and vanilla stir till melted in a bowl whisk egg yolks and sugar . slowly add cream to egg . strain through a sieve pour into 4 custard cups . place in baking pan and add hot water to halfway up custard cups . bake until set cover and refrigerate overnight mix sugars together and sprinkle on top caramelize

name: kale salad with quinoa and cranberries
description: this hearty, fall kale salad with quinoa and cranberries is made even better by massaging the kale which helps break down the tough cell structure and gives the raw kale a softer texture and gentler flavor.
ingredients: 1 large garlic clove, 1 small shallot, juice of 1 lemon, 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, 1 teaspoon pure maple syrup, kosher salt to taste, freshly ground black pepper to taste, 1 bunch lacinato kale, 1/4 cup sliced almonds, 1 cup cooked quinoa, 1/4 cup dried cranberries, 2 tablespoons grated or shaved parmesan cheese
steps: combine all of the ingredients for the dressing in a large bowl and set aside while you prep the kale . this will soften the shallots and allow the flavors to get friendly . add the chopped kale to the bowl with the dressing . massage the kale in handfuls literally rub the leaves between your fingers for a minute or two, until the leaves soften and darken in color . yes, i know giving your salad a rubdown is a little weird, but it's worth it . do not skip this step . briefly set aside . toast the almonds . heat a small skillet over medium heat . do not put any oil in the pan add the almonds to the pan and cook for 2 to 3 minutes, shaking the pan regularly, until golden brown and fragrant . immediately transfer to a small bowl . add the quinoa, along with half of the almonds and half of the cranberries to the kale and toss to combine . transfer your salad to a serving platter or plates, top with the remaining almonds and cranberries, and sprinkle with the cheese.

name: strawberry coconut bar
description: strawberry coconut bar with graham cracker crumbs, butter, flaked coconut, eagle brand sweetened condensed milk, smucker's strawberry preserves, toasted pecans, semi sweet chocolate chips, white chocolate baking bar
ingredients: 1.7 cup graham cracker crumbs, 0.5 cup butter, 2.7 cup flaked coconut, 14.0 ounce eagle brand sweetened condensed milk, 1.5 cup smucker's strawberry preserves, 0.5 cup toasted pecans, 0.8 cup semi sweet chocolate chips, 2.0 ounce white chocolate baking bar
steps: heat oven to 350degf . combine graham cracker crumbs and butter in small bowl mix well . press crumb mixture firmly into bottom of ungreased 13 x 9 inch baking pan . sprinkle coconut over crust . pour sweetened condensed milk evenly over coconut . bake 20 minutes . cool 1 hour . spread preserves evenly over top of cooled bars sprinkle pecans over top . drizzle melted chocolate over bars repeat with white chocolate . chill . cut into bars.

name: honey mustard quorn/chicken with avocado and roasted tomatoes on a bed of beans
description: a lovely recipe adapted from cafedelites recipe for a honey mustard salad . this is a lovely, summery dish.
ingredients: none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none, none none
steps: quarter the tomatoes and dress lightly with oil, salt and pepper, turning your oven up to 200degc place the oiled tomatoes on a baking tray and place into the oven for 20 minutes . while they are roasting, continue with the other steps combine the olive oil, mustard, garlic, honey and a pinch of salt in a bowl, whisking well to thoroughly combine oil a pan and fry your quorn or chicken fillet s, pouring the honey mustard mixture over the top as it fries and thoroughly coating it . prepare the avocado by slicing it into thin pieces add all of the beans to a pan of boiling water and cook until tender lay the beans out on a plate, topping with the avocado slices and roasted tomatoes finish the dish by topping with the sliced quorn/chicken and dress with a small amount of olive oil and honey

name: makeover spinach gratin
description: creamy spinach with a hint of nutmeg is baked in the oven topped with melted cheese for guiltless decadent holiday side dish . yes, spinach gratin just got a makeover
ingredients: 3 tbsp whipped butter, 1 cup finely chopped onion, 1/4 cup flour, 1/4 tsp fresh grated nutmeg, 3 cups 2 milk, 3 lbs 3 16 oz packages frozen chopped spinach, defrosted, 3/4 cup freshly grated parmesan cheese, 1 tbsp kosher salt, 1/2 tsp freshly ground black pepper, 1/2 cup shredded swiss or gruyere cheese
steps: preheat the oven to 425deg . in a heavy bottomed saute pan melt the butter over medium heat . add the onions and saute until translucent, about 10 12 minutes . add the flour and nutmeg cook 2 more minutes, stirring occasionally . add the milk and cook until thickened, about 5 7 minutes . squeeze as much liquid as possible from the spinach and add the spinach to the sauce . add 1/2 cup of the parmesan cheese and mix well . season to taste, with salt and pepper . transfer the spinach to a large baking dish and sprinkle the remaining 1/4 cup parmesan and the swiss cheese on top . bake for 20 minutes until hot and bubbly . serve hot.

name: chick pea and roasted pepper dip
description: none
ingredients: 15 oz can garbanzo beans, 1 roasted red pepper, 2 tbsp fresh parsley, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp sesame oil, juice of 1 lemon, salt and fresh pepper
steps: combine all ingredients in a food processor . add a little water if it is too thick . blend until smooth . serve with fresh vegetables like cucumbers, peppers, celery, or whatever you desire.

name: beef stew
description: beef stew with beef stew meat, flour, vegetable oil, mccormick bay leaves, seasoned salt, mccormick thyme leaves, mccormick black pepper, beef broth, carrots, medium potatoes, onions, celery ribs
ingredients: 2.0 pound beef stew meat, 3.0 tablespoon flour, 2.0 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1.0 mccormick bay leaves, 1.0 tablespoon seasoned salt, 0.5 teaspoon mccormick thyme leaves, 0.2 teaspoon mccormick black pepper, 14.5 ounce beef broth, 4.0 carrots, 4.0 medium potatoes, 4.0 onions, 2.0 celery ribs
steps: coat beef with flour . heat oil in large saucepan or dutch oven on medium high heat . add 1/2 of the beef brown on all sides . repeat with remaining beef . stir in seasonings and beef broth . bring to boil . reduce heat to low cover and simmer 1 1/2 hours . stir in vegetables cover . simmer 30 minutes or until vegetables are tender . add additional water as necessary . remove bay leaf before serving.

name: potato salad with dill and dijon
description: a unique and flavorful chilled salad recipe with new potatoes, mayonnaise, whole grain dijon mustard, vinegar and fresh dill.
ingredients: 2 lbs red new potatoes cut into 1 inch chunks, 1/4 cup nonfat greek yogurt, 1/4 cup mayonnaise or veganaise, 3 tbsp chopped fresh dill, 1 1/2 tbsp white wine vinegar or champagne vinegar, 1 tbsp whole grain dijon mustard, 2 1/2 tsp sugar, 1/2 tsp salt or more to taste, 1/4 tsp black pepper, sprig of fresh dill to garnish
steps: you can use peeled or unpeeled potatoes in this salad . if you decide not to peel them, make sure you scrub them very well to get rid of any residual dirt . boil 3 quarts of water with 2 tsp salt . add the new potato chunks to the salted water and bring back to a boil . simmer for about 10 minutes until they become fork tender . keep a close eye on them to make sure they don't overcook . as soon as they are tender, drain the potatoes, return them to the warm pot so they will dry out, and let them return to room temperature.in a bowl, whisk together greek yogurt, mayonnaise, fresh dill, vinegar, whole grain dijon mustard, sugar, salt and pepper to make a dressing . place the cooled potato chunks in a salad bowl . add dressing . stir gently to combine until all potato pieces are evenly coated with the dressing . taste and adjust seasoning as desired . chill salad in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes . serve cold.

name: chicken and sage risotto
description: chicken and sage risotto with fat free reduced sodium chicken broth, i can't believe it's not butter made with olive oil spread, yellow onion, yellow bell pepper, arborio rice, garlic, cut up cooked chicken, grated parmesan cheese, chopped fresh sage
ingredients: 4.0 cup fat free reduced sodium chicken broth, 3.0 tablespoon i can't believe it's not butter made with olive oil spread, 1.0 yellow onion, 1.0 yellow bell pepper, 1.0 cup arborio rice, 1.0 clove garlic, 2.0 cup cut up cooked chicken, 0.5 cup grated parmesan cheese, 2.0 teaspoon chopped fresh sage
steps: heat broth in 2 quart saucepan over high heat just to a simmer . reduce heat to low and cover . meanwhile, melt 2 tablespoons i can't believe it's not butter made with olive oil spread in 3 quart saucepan over medium heat and cook onion and yellow pepper, stirring occasionally, 5 minutes or until tender . add rice and garlic and cook, stirring frequently, 2 minutes . stir in hot broth and bring to a boil over high heat . reduce heat and simmer covered, stirring occasionally, 25 minutes or until almost all liquid is absorbed and rice is creamy and tender . stir in chicken and cook covered, stirring occasionally, 2 minutes or until heated through . stir in cheese, sage and remaining 1 tablespoons mediterranean blend . serve immediately and sprinkle, if desired, with additional grated parmesan cheese.

name: quinoa ratatouille
description: quinoa ratatouille with low sodium vegetable broth, quinoa, i can't believe it's not butter it's vegan, zucchini, cherry tomatoes, shallots, garlic, fresh basil leaves
