steps: verwarm de oven voor op 200degc . snijd de aubergine in de lengte in dunne plakken, bestrooi deze met wat zout en laat ze 20 minuten in een vergiet uitlekken . spoel ze af en dep ze droog met wat keukenpapier . snijd de tomaten in stukjes en de mozzarella in plakjes . pers de knoflook uit . snijd de basilicum fijn . bak de knoflook even aan in 2 eetlepels olijfolie . voeg de tomaten en een deel van de fijngesneden basilicum toe en roerbak op hoog vuur gedurende 2 minuten . laat een grillpan goed heet worden . druppel wat olijfolie over de plakken aubergine en grill ze aan beide kanten tot ze mooie grillstrepen hebben . leg ze op een snijplank uit . verdeel de mozzarella over de plakken aubergine en schep op elke plak een flinke eetlepel tomatensaus . rol de aubergineplakken op en leg ze naast elkaar in een ovenschaal . bak de rolletjes 5 minuten in de oven en serveer ze met de overgebleven tomatensaus en basilicum.

name: autumn apple and grape medley
description: none
ingredients: 3 cups 16 oz green seedless grapes, washed and dried well, 4 cups 24 oz gala apples, diced, 1/2 tsp lemon juice, 8 oz fat free chobani greek yogurt, 4 oz light cream cheese, 1/4 cup light agave, 1 tsp vanilla extract, 2 tbsp brown sugar, 1/2 cup chopped walnuts
steps: cut grapes in half and set aside . dice apples into small pieces about the same size as the cut grapes . toss with lemon juice to prevent the apples from browning . mix yogurt, cream cheese, agave and vanilla until blended well . stir in grapes and apples and pour into 8 small bowls or ramekins or one large serving di combine brown sugar and crushed walnuts . sprinkle over top of each ramekin . chill until ready to serve.

name: skillet chicken with marsala and mixed mushrooms
description: skillet chicken with marsala and mixed mushrooms with marsala wine, olive oil, cremini mushrooms, sweet onion, garlic, water, knorr homestyle stock chicken, cornstarch, boneless skinless chicken breasts
ingredients: 1.0 cup marsala wine, 3.0 tablespoon olive oil, 10.0 ounce cremini mushrooms, 1.0 sweet onion, 1.0 clove garlic, 1.5 cup water, 1.0 knorr homestyle stock chicken, 2.0 teaspoon cornstarch, 4.0 boneless skinless chicken breasts
steps: reduce marsala wine in large skillet until syrupy consistency . stir in water and knorr homestyle stock chicken and bring to a boil . whisk in cornstarch blended with 1/4 cup water until smooth and slightly thickened . rub chicken with 1 tablespoon olive oil . grill in hot grill pan, turning once, until chicken is thoroughly cooked . remove chicken from grill pan keep warm . heat remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil in another skillet and cook mushrooms until tender and starting to brown . add onion and garlic and cook until tender . to serve, slice chicken into halves . arrange 1/2 of the mushrooms on serving platter, then top with chicken and remaining mushrooms . pour sauce over and sprinkle, if desired, with chopped fresh parsley.

name: pulled pork chili slow cooker or instant pot
description: this recipe is courtesy of mama loves food https //www.mamalovesfood.com/ .
ingredients: 3.0 pound pork shoulder, 28.0 ounce baked beans, 15.0 ounce tomatoes, 15.0 ounce cannellini beans, 1.0 package chili seasoning, 1.0 cup chicken stock, 15.0 ounce chopped onion, chopped onions, sour cream, shredded cheese, pickled jalapenos
steps: first, add everything to the inner pot of your slow cooker or instant pot . then, stir to mix . next, for instant pot cover and set to manual, then natural pressure release for 65 minutes . or, for slow cooker cook covered on high or low until pork shreds easily with a fork . finally, remove pork from cooker and shred with a fork . return to cooker and mix well.

name: italian sausage and peppers salad
description: italian sausage and peppers salad with sweet italian sausage links, cut into, red bell pepper, sliced, sweet onion, wish bone italian dressing, torn romaine lettuce leaves
ingredients: 1.0 pound sweet italian sausage links, cut into, 2.0 red bell pepper, sliced, 1.0 sweet onion, 0.8 cup wish bone italian dressing, 6.0 cup torn romaine lettuce leaves
steps: grill or broil sausage and vegetables, brushing vegetables with 1/4 cup wish bone italian dressing, until sausage is done and vegetables are tender . thinly slice sausage . toss sausage and vegetables with remaining 1/2 cup dressing . arrange lettuce on serving platter and top with sausage and vegetables . drizzle, if desired, with additional dressing.

name: lee kum kee grilled salmon with oyster sauce
description: this light, fresh and healthy salmon dish adds a unique twist by using premium oyster sauce which enhances the dish with rich flavor
ingredients: 1.0 pound salmon, 2.0 tablespoon lemon juice, 1.0 bottle lee kum kee oyster flavored sauce
steps: in a bowl, marinade salmon with lee kum kee oyster flavored sauce for 10 minutes . grill salmon for 5 minutes on each side, until done . drizzle lemon juice on salmon . serve.

name: provencal dorade
description: whole baked fish might sound like a daunting task for dinner, but it is actually quite easy to pull together . this recipe is inspired by the french provance . a bed of sliced onions, garlic, potatoes, and tomatoes make for a hearty and delicious base . once this base is set, lemon stuffed fish tops it before it all gets briefly baked in the oven . this dish is great in the summer when tomatoes are at their peak ripeness.
ingredients: 2.0 kilogram potatoes, 1.0 onion, 2.0 clove garlic, olive oil, salt, 6.0 ounce water, 6.0 ounce dry white wine, 3.0 tomatoes, ground black pepper, none none, 1.0 lemon, herbs
steps: preheat oven to 425 degrees fahrenheit . peel the potatoes and slice them thinly . cut the garlic and onion in rings . in an oiled baking dish, place the potatoes in layers alternating with onion and garlic . salt and add the water and the wine . place the sliced tomatoes on top . bake for 15 minutes . meanwhile, lightly salt and pepper the inside of the breams . cut a few slices of lemon and re cut each slice in half . place the lemon slices inside the fish . put the breams on the tomatoes, add a drizzle of olive oil and sprinkle with provencal herbs . if the potatoes are a little dry, add a little water in the dish . put it in the oven for 20 minutes . the potatoes should be melting.

name: peppered roo fillet with choy sum and corander pesto
description: peppered roo fillet with choy sum and corander pesto with kangaroo fillets, choy sum, chilli, salt, pepper, coriander, parmesan cheese, garlic, olive oil, pine nuts, chilli powder, salt, pepper
ingredients: 4.0 kangaroo fillets, 2.0 bunch choy sum, 1.0 chilli, salt, pepper, 2.0 bunch coriander, parmesan cheese, 1.0 clove garlic, olive oil, pine nuts, chilli powder, salt, pepper
steps: rub kangaroo with small amount of olive oil and crack black pepper and salt onto sides of each fillet as if making a pepper steak . cover and set aside . chop coriander and put all other ingredients for the pesto into a blender and pulse until mixed well but still a bit chunky . i have not given measurements as its best to make it to your own taste . bring a pot of salted water to the boil, and at the same time heat a fry pan until very hot and ready for the roo . pan fry the roo for 3.5 mins each side for a nice medium rare fillet . remove roo from pan and set aside to rest . while the fillets are resting, place choy sum into boiling water and blanch for about 4 minutes or until a nice bright green colour . drain and divide among the 4 plates . slice the kangaroo fillets and arrange on top of the choy sum . place a tablespoon of pesto on each plate and garnish with sliced chilli . serve.

name: karamelijs met poffertjes, appel en kaneel
description: het recept poffertjes zou je kunnen gebruiken voor het zelf poffertjes maken . in dit recept gebruiken we appel kaneel en karamel maken hoeft niet, want dat zit al in het ijs . deze karamelijs met poffertjes, appel en kaneel is een heerlijk toetje.
ingredients: 2.0 appels, 5.0 tablespoon citroensap, 1.0 tablespoon poedersuiker, 5.0 teaspoon kaneel, 12.0 poffertjes, 4.0 hertog romige karamel
steps: was de appels, snijd ze allebei in 12 partjes, snijd het klokhuis eruit en besprenkel de partjes met citroensap . meng het poedersuiker met de kaneel . verwarm de poffertjes volgens de aanwijzingen op de verpakking . leg de warme poffertjes en de partjes appel op 4 kleine bordjes . bestrooi met het poedersuikermengsel . schep in het midden van elk een bolletje hertog romige karamelijs.

name: brussels sprouts gratin
description: brussels sprouts gratin are roasted until crisp, then topped with a light cheese sauce made with gruyere and parmesan the perfect holiday dish
ingredients: 16 oz brussels sprouts, 1/4 tsp kosher salt, black pepper, olive oil spray, 1/2 tbsp butter, 1/3 cup chopped shallots, 2 tsp all purpose flour, 3/4 cup fat free milk, 1/4 tsp kosher salt, 1 tsp fresh thyme, 1 tbsp grated parmesan cheese, 2 oz grated gruyere cheese
steps: preheat oven to 400degf . spray an 8"x12" gratin dish or casserole with olive oil . add the brussels sprouts and season with salt and pepper . spray more olive oil over the brussels and place in the lower third of the oven . bake 15 minutes, toss and bake an additional 10 minutes . meanwhile, heat a medium nonstick pan over medium heat . add butter and let it melt, add the shallots and cook until softened, about 4 to 5 minutes . sprinkle the flour over the shallots to make a roux, whisking for 1 to 2 minutes . add the milk and stir with a wooden spoon until the roux is incorporated into the milk . cook over medium low heat for about 4 minutes, stirring, until the sauce thickens . add fresh thyme, parmesan and half of the grated gruyere cheese into the white sauce and stir until the cheese is melted and incorporated into the sauce . pour over the brussels sprouts, and top with the remaining cheese . bake for 15 minutes until top is lightly browned and bubbly.

name: peanut butter honey truffles
description: peanut butter honey truffles with coconut a simple, unprocessed, healthy snack for a burst of sweet protein between meals . kosher, pareve.
ingredients: 1/4 cup oats, 1/2 cup natural unsweetened peanut butter, 1/4 cup honey, 1/2 tsp vanilla, pinch salt, 2 3 tbsp dried shredded coconut
steps: pulse the oats in a blender for 30 45 seconds till they become a powdery flour . in a mixing bowl, stir together peanut butter, honey, vanilla, salt and oat flour . roll the peanut butter mixture into 1 inch balls . roll each ball in dried coconut to coat.place truffles in the refrigerator . chill for at least 30 minutes . serve cold . store truffles in the refrigerator.

name: up to you fruit sorbet
description: a fat free alternative to ice cream yes it's sorbet sorbet is normally just frozen ice, so it does not have any cream or milk in it . now you may think it's okay to gorge in sorbet, but unfortunately, many sorbets out there still have so much sugar in them . so yes it is better than ice cream, but it's still not a health food . here we have scouted all around web to find a easy and low sugar recipe for you . this does not require a ice cream machine, only a blender/ food processor fruit choices are also important fruits that are fleshy and smooth such as strawberries and mango have better results . you can also use less sugar if you choose fruits that are originally sweet and ripe . choose your favorite fruits, taste the mixture before freezing, it's completely personal and up to you <3 suggested combinations strawberry and banana, mango and papaya, pineapple and coconut juice adapted from food.com
ingredients: 4.0 cup frozen fruit, 4.0 tablespoon sugar, 1.0 lemon
steps: combine frozen fruit, sugar and liquid in a food processor until smooth . feel free to add more liquid if it is too icy and hard to process . taste the mixture, pour into container and freeze until set . for smoother texture, mix the icy mixture once in a while until it sets . before serving, transfer to the fridge for about 15 mins to soften.

name: chicken and green beans with alfredo blue cheese pasta
description: chicken and green beans with alfredo blue cheese pasta with i can't believe it's not butter spread, boneless skinless chicken breasts, sweet onion, water, milk, knorr pasta sides alfredo, green beans, shredded mozzarella cheese, blue cheese
ingredients: 2.0 tablespoon i can't believe it's not butter spread, 4.0 boneless skinless chicken breasts, 0.5 cup sweet onion, 3.0 cup water, 1.0 cup milk, 2.0 package knorr pasta sides alfredo, 0.5 pound green beans, 4.0 slice shredded mozzarella cheese, 0.2 cup blue cheese
steps: melt 1 tablespoon spread in 12 inch nonstick skillet over medium high heat and cook chicken, turning once, 8 minutes or until thoroughly cooked . remove chicken and set aside . melt remaining 1 tablespoon spread and cook onion, stirring occasionally, 3 minutes or until tender . add water and milk and bring to a boil . stir in knorr pasta sides alfredo and continue boiling until pasta is tender, about 7 minutes . return chicken to skillet, then evenly top with green beans and mozzarella cheese . cover and remove from heat . let stand until cheese is melted, about 1 minute . sprinkle with blue cheese and freshly grated black pepper.

name: richard simmons' beet bowl salad
description: an interview with richard simmons and his healthy, creative recipe for beet bowl salad . easy vegan modification.
ingredients: 6 very large beets, 2 carrots, peeled, 2 celery stalks, 1 small cucumber, 2 tbsp chopped fresh chives, 2 tbsp champagne vinegar, 1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil, freshly ground black pepper, 2 tbsp grated parmesan cheese
steps: remove the greens from the beets, keeping a small portion of the stem and the whole tail intact this will help keep the natural juices inside the beets . cook the beets until tender, either by steaming richard's recommendation or by roasting . do not boil the beets, they will lose flavor and nutrients . steaming or roasting is preferable . to learn how to roast beets, click here . if roasting, be sure to turn the beets often so they don't become flat on one side . to steam the beets, place them in a steaming basket over boiling water . let them steam for 1 2 hours till tender . cooking times will vary based on the size of the beets . test tenderness with a wooden skewer if it glides quickly to the center of the beet, it's done . once the beets are cooked, peel them . richard recommends wearing disposable gloves to keep your fingers from staining . i usually peel them under cool running water . be sure to peel the beets when they're warm, it's easier that way . when the beets are peeled, slice off the tops stem ends and bottoms tails to make them flat on each side . stand the beets up on the flat bottom end and make sure they stand stable/flat and aren't tilted . if they are tilted, adjust by slicing a little more off the bottom until it stands straight . once the beets are peeled and trimmed, let them cool to room temperature, then place them into the refrigerator covered with plastic wrap to chill completely . when the beets are thoroughly chilled, use a melon baller to scoop out the center portions of the beets to form a "beet bowl." leave a wall intact around the sides of the beets and a sturdy base at the bottom, so it will stand up to stuffing . dice the scooped out beet pulp into small pieces . place in a mixing bowl . julienne or grate the carrots, then julienne the celery into small, thin pieces . peel the cucumber halfway, leaving stripes of skin down the sides of the vegetable . dice the cucumber into small pieces . add the prepared carrots, celery and cucumber to the mixing bowl along with the chopped chives, vinegar and olive oil . gently toss the salad mixture till blended . season with freshly ground black pepper to taste . use a small spoon to fill each beet with the dressed, seasoned salad mixture . you will have a little bit of the salad leftover . eat it . it's yummy . once the beets are stuffed, top each one with a bit of grated parmesan cheese . serve . you can stuff the beets up to 24 hours ahead and chill in the fridge till ready to serve . add the parmesan cheese just before serving . passover modification substitute balsamic vinegar for champagne vinegar . you can make the salad dairy free vegan/pareve by omitting the parmesan cheese and lightly salting the filling to taste . sprinkle the top of each beet with chopped chives instead of parmesan.

name: too easy tofu
description: this is my tried and true recipe for quick and easy tofu to add to any meal . freezing is the secret there is a ton of give and take in this recipe since i don't believe in measuring, but i try to use as little oil as possible . this is a great base to work with, and is extremely easy and low maintenance . i use my toaster oven, so there isn't even any pre heating.
ingredients: 1.0 block extra firm tofu, 0.2 cup oil, 2.0 tablespoon soy sauce, black pepper
steps: freeze the tofu block for at least 24 hours and then move to fridge or counter to thaw . preheat oven to 400 degrees . open tofu and drain i generally just squeeze carefully with my hands or use press method . cube tofu into 1"x1" blocks or bigger as desired squeeze again if they are still really wet in a bowl or freezer bag add the soy sauce so they all get a bit not soaked, but flavored add oil and stir or shake to coat evenly spray medium cookie sheet with cooking spray seems silly since they are coated with oil, but tofu loves to stick bake at 400 degrees for about 30 minutes turning every 10 15. remove when crisped to your liking . they hold up well to re heating as long as it isn't in the microwave.

name: fiesta bean salad
description: black beans, chick peas, tomatoes, cilantro and avocado are tossed with a cumin lime vinaigrette i love the bright, fresh flavors of this quick and easy salad perfect for lunch, meatless mondays, or even as a side dish with grilled steak, shrimp or chicken.
ingredients: 2 cloves garlic, 3 tbsp fresh lime juice, 1 tbsp extra virgin olive, 1 tsp cumin, pinch crushed red pepper flakes, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 15 oz can black beans, 1 cup canned chickpeas, 1 cup cherry tomatoes, 1/4 cup minced red onion, 1/4 cup cilantro, 1 medium avocado
steps: in a large bowl, combine the garlic, lime juice, oil, cumin, crushed red pepper, and salt . add the black beans, chickpeas, tomato, onion and cilantro mix well . when ready to eat, gently mix in avocado and serve right away.

name: santa fe egg rolls
description: santa fe egg rolls with black beans, corn, red bell pepper, jalapeno pepper, green onions, sharp cheddar cheese, monterey jack cheese, salt, sriracha sauce, egg roll wrappers, oil
ingredients: 1.0 can black beans, 0.5 cup corn, 0.5 red bell pepper, 1.0 jalapeno pepper, 2.0 green onions, 2.0 ounce sharp cheddar cheese, 2.0 ounce monterey jack cheese, 0.2 teaspoon salt, 0.2 teaspoon sriracha sauce, 25.0 egg roll wrappers, oil
steps: place the shredding disc into the work bowl of the kitchenaid pro line 16 cup food processor and use the medium food pusher to shred the cheddar and monterey jack cheeses . remove the shredding disc . use the spatula to move the cheese away from the center of the bowl and attach the multipurpose blade, pushing to lock . add in the black beans, corn, red pepper, jalapeno, green onions, salt, and srichacha . pulse 20 times or until mixture is rough chopped and mixed well . prepare a baking sheet with parchment paper and fill a small bowl with water . lay egg roll wrappers on the baking sheet and place 1 tablespoon of the black bean mixture in a line near the bottom of each wrapper . lightly wet the edges of the wrappers with fingertips and carefully fold the sides of each in towards the middle . roll up and seal tightly . heat 1/2 inch of oil in a large saute pan to 375 degrees . fry the egg rolls in batches, 2 3 minutes on each side, or until brown and crispy . place cooked egg rolls onto a plate lined with paper towel to absorb the oil . egg rolls with crisp up further while sitting . serve with sour cream . tip if you do not have a thermometer, test the oil by dropping in a tiny bit of filling . if the oil bubbles right away it is ready

name: maple soy glazed salmon
description: maple soy glazed salmon is a quick and easy, 5 ingredient salmon dish
ingredients: 3 tbsp pure maple syrup, 3 tbsp reduced sodium soy sauce, 1 tbsp sriracha hot sauce, 1 clove garlic, 4 6 oz wild salmon fillets, skinless
steps: combine maple syrup, soy sauce, sriracha and garlic in a small bowl, pour into a gallon sized resealable bag and add the salmon . marinate 20 to 60 minutes, turning once in a while . preheat oven to 425degf . lightly grease a baking sheet with nonstick spray . remove the fish from the marinade and pat dry with paper towels . pour the marinade in a small saucepan . place the fish on the baking sheet and cook 8 to 10 minutes . meanwhile, bring the marinade to a simmer over medium heat and reduce until it thickens into a glaze . spoon over fish just before eating.

name: quinoa enchilada casserole
description: traditional enchiladas break out of their tortilla shells and into a quinoa casserole.
ingredients: 2.0 cup water, 0.5 cup uncooked quinoa, 1.0 can enchilada sauce, 1.0 can diced tomatoes with green chiles, 1.0 cup corn kernels, 1.2 cup black beans, 2.0 tablespoon chopped cilantro, 0.5 teaspoon cumin, 0.5 teaspoon paprika, 0.3 cup shredded monterey jack cheese, 0.3 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, 0.2 teaspoon salt, 0.1 teaspoon black pepper, 0.2 cup shredded monterey jack cheese, 0.2 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, 1.0 avocado, 2.0 tablespoon sour cream, 1.0 lime
steps: preheat the oven to 400degf . bring water to a boil in a small saucepan over high heat . add the quinoa and return to a boil . reduce to a low simmer, cover pot, and cook quinoa until tender, 12 15 minutes . place quinoa, enchilada sauce, diced tomatoes with green chilies, corn, black beans, cilantro, cumin, paprika, monterey jack, mozzarella, salt, and pepper in a large mixing bowl . stir to combine with a rubber spatula . transfer to a 9x9 inch baking dish and spread into an even layer . sprinkle the cheeses evenly over top of the casserole . bake the casserole on middle rack of oven until bubbling, 25 30 minutes . check to see that casserole is done . remove from oven or add time as needed . serve casserole garnished with diced avocado, sour cream, and lime, if desired.

name: very berry banana fro yo shake
description: cross between smoothie and milk shake, this fro yo shake uses frozen yogurt and fresh bananas and berries . perfect for a quick dessert or even breakfast and takes less than 5 minutes to make
ingredients: 1/2 cup mixed berries, 1/2 ripe frozen banana, 1/2 cup organic nonfat vanilla frozen yogurt, 1/2 cup unsweetened vanilla almond milk
steps: place all the ingredients in the blender and blend until smooth.

name: tofu tahini dan dan noodles
description: tofu recipes are a dime a dozen, but unfortunately it takes some pretty mad tofu chops to get it to taste like anything . all too often, people are presented with a plate of tofu that leaves them yearning for meat and flavor . this dish will wipe away all your bean curd blues we've amped up tofu with our spicy, dan dan noodles recipe . creamy tahini, salty soy, sweet honey, and spicy sriracha coat the noodles . the firm tofu is cooked crispy and seasoned with the flavors of the sichuan province of china . you too can love tofu
ingredients: 8.0 chinese egg noodles, 2.0 cup tofu, 2.0 tablespoon sriracha, 2.0 tablespoon honey, 3.0 tablespoon soy sauce, 2.0 tablespoon tahini, 2.0 whole scallions, 2.0 garlic cloves, vegetable oil, ginger, peanuts
steps: place a medium pot over high heat . add water and bring to a boil for the noodles . next, place a pan or wok over very high heat and coat with vegetable oil . crumble up your tofu and add it to the pan . in a large bowl, combine the sriracha, honey, 2 tablespoons of soy sauce, and tahini to make the dressing . grab 2 tablespoons of your boiling water from the stove and add it to your dressing . stir to combine . thinly slice the scallions . add half of them to the dressing and reserve the other half for garnish . toss your egg noodles into the pot of boiling water and cook until tender, about 4 minutes . the tofu should be browning in the pan by now . grab your garlic cloves, we're going to mash them into a paste . first, crush the cloves with the side of your knife . add a pinch of salt, and continue to chop and smear the garlic until it reaches a pasty consistency . to the tofu, add garlic paste along with 2 teaspoons of soy sauce . if you have fresh, grated ginger you could add this to the tofu now . remove egg noodles from water and add them to the bowl of dressing, mixing well . if you are adding nuts, they can be added now . next add the dressed noodles to the tofu pan and toss well to gloss the noodles . hit the tofu with one more teaspoon of soy and another teaspoon of sriracha, if you like it hot . pile the dressed noodles on the plate, making sure to get enough tofu mixed in . top with reserved scallions and one last hit of sriracha if you really want to set yourself on fire . hot tip if you aren't using the white part of the scallion, pop it into a cup of water, place in your fridge and it'll keep on growing.

name: spanish style shrimp and rice stir fry
description: stir fry doesn't always have to have an asian inspiration . this decadent dish is hearty, takes only 45 minutes to prepare and is only 230 calories per serving . this spanish style shrimp and rice stir fry combines decadent ingredients with aromatic spices for a divine dish everyone will love . with four servings in this recipe it is perfect for a family dinner . add these ingredeints to your next shopping trip and surprise your family.
ingredients: 1.0 tablespoon olive oil, 1.0 onion, 2.0 tomatoes, 1.0 green bell pepper, 2.0 clove garlic, 1.0 cup rice, 400.0 gram shrimp, 1.0 cube shrimp bouillon, 1.0 envelope saffron, 2.0 cup water, salt, ground black pepper
steps: cover the rice generously with cold water and set aside for 3 minutes . place 2 cups of room temperature water into a pan, add the rice and shrimp bouillon . don't stir the rice . turn the heat up to high, and when the water starts to boil lower the heat to low, and cover the pan . place a little olive oil in a pan, and saute the onion, tomato, bell pepper, and garlic for approximately 2 minutes . blend the vegetable mix in the blender for 20 seconds it should still be chunky . pour the blended mixture onto the rice with the saffron powder and shrimp . do not mix or stir . cook on low heat with the cover off for approximately 35 minutes, until the rice is ready, and almost all the water has been evaporated.

name: halloween devil's food cupcakes
description: vintage recipe for devil's food cake cupcakes with orange buttercream frosting a historical halloween holiday dessert tradition.
ingredients: 2 1/2 cups sifted white cake flour, 1 1/2 tsp baking powder, 3/4 tsp baking soda, 1/2 tsp salt, 4 oz unsweetened dark chocolate, 1 3/4 cups sugar, divided, 1 1/2 cups buttermilk, divided, 1/2 cup unsalted butter, room temperature, 3 large eggs, room temperature, well beaten, 1 tsp vanilla, 1 cup unsalted butter, room temperature, 3 4 cups powdered sugar, sifted, 1/4 tsp salt, 2 tsp vanilla, coconut, or orange flavoring extract, 1 4 tbsp milk, red and yellow food coloring
steps: preheat oven to 350 degrees f . sift together the flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt . sift the mixture again three more times . reserve . chop the chocolate into small pieces and melt it in a double boiler or in a glass bowl over a pot of boiling water, stirring frequently with a rubber spatula, till the chocolate is smooth . whisk in 1/2 cup sugar and 1/2 cup buttermilk till they are melted and well blended into the chocolate . remove from heat and set aside . in a large mixing bowl, cream together 1/2 cup butter and 1 1/4 cups sugar for several minutes till light, fluffy, and no longer grainy looking . note it's very important that the butter is at room temperature, or it won't cream properly . beat in the eggs . beat in a quarter of the flour mixture along with all of the melted chocolate mixture . add the remaining flour mixture and 1 cup of buttermilk to the batter alternately in small amounts, beating thoroughly after each addition . stir in the vanilla . line two cupcake tins with paper liners . fill each liner about 2/3 full with batter don't fill them too high or they will overflow . bake the cupcakes for 20 25 minutes, until the center of the cupcakes spring back when they're pressed gently . don't bake them too long or the tops will become tough . let the cupcakes cool in the tin slightly, then remove and continue cooling on a wire rack . while the cupcakes are baking, make the frosting . sift together 3 cups of powdered sugar and salt into a large mixing bowl . don't skip the sifting, if you do your frosting will turn out chunky . add 1 cup room temperature butter to the mixing bowl . beat the butter into the sugar, starting on low speed and gradually increasing to medium, till the sugar is fully incorporated into the butter . beat in the flavoring, then add the milk, a teaspoon at a time, till the desired consistency is reached . a little liquid goes a long way, so add milk with care . for frosting cupcakes, you'll want a consistency somewhere between soft and stiff a medium texture, which will work well both for spreading with a knife, and for using a decorating tip . adjust the texture by adding more powdered sugar to thicken the frosting and stiffen it, or more milk to thin out the frosting and make it softer . color the frosting by adding equal amounts of red and yellow food coloring . use a few drops for a light orange frosting, or several drops for a more vibrant color . adjust the color by adding more red or yellow till it looks right to your eye . decorate the cupcakes with orange buttercream frosting after the cupcakes have completely cooled . store frosted cupcakes in the refrigerator, take them out 15 20 minutes before serving to let the frosting soften a bit . note the frosting recipe above will provide enough frosting for using a knife to spread on 24 cupcakes . if you are using a decorating tip or a more advanced frosting technique like the florets pictured here, i recommend doubling the amount of frosting to ensure that you have enough for decorating all the cupcakes.

name: grilled shrimp and watermelon chopped salad
description: grilled shrimp and watermelon chopped salad uses romaine tossed with sweet, juicy watermelon, grilled shrimp and goat cheese with a golden balsamic vinaigrette i'll be making this salad all summer
ingredients: 2 1/2 tbsp delallo golden balsamic vinegar, 1 tsp water, 1 tbsp chopped shallots, 1/8 th tsp kosher salt, pinch fresh black pepper, 2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil, 10 oz shelled and deveined, 1 clove garlic crushed, seasoned salt, 8 cups chopped romaine, 4 cups diced watermelon, 4 ounces soft goat cheese
steps: in a small bowl, combine vinegar, water, shallots, salt and pepper . gradually add olive oil, stirring until incorporated . for the shrimp if cooking outside on the grill, soak skewers at least 30 minutes . season shrimp with seasoned salt, then mix in crushed garlic . thread the shrimp onto the skewers . light the grill or indoor grill pan on medium to medium high flame, when hot spray the grates with oil and grill the shrimp about 1 to 2 minutes on each side . set aside . in a large bowl toss the romaine with the dressing . divide between for plates and top with watermelon, goat cheese and grilled shrimp.

name: mini corn dog muffins
description: mini corn dog muffins with corn muffin mix, velveeta, oscar mayer beef franks, grey poupon savory honey mustard
ingredients: 8.5 ounce corn muffin mix, 2.0 ounce velveeta, 4.0 oscar mayer beef franks, 0.5 cup grey poupon savory honey mustard
steps: heat oven to 375of . prepare muffin batter as directed on package spoon into 24 mini muffin pan cups sprayed with cooking spray . press 1 each velveeta cube and hot dog slice into batter in center of each muffin cup . bake 10 to 12 min . or until golden brown . cool 5 min . before removing from pans . serve warm with mustard.

name: quick chicken soup
description: quick chicken soup with onion, egg, cooked chicken breast, sliced carrots, chicken broth, parsley, chicken, min
ingredients: 0.5 onion, 1.0 bag egg, 2.0 can cooked chicken breast, 1.0 can sliced carrots, chicken broth, parsley, chicken, 20.0 min
steps: saute onion, add chicken broth bring to boil and add noddles

name: all american cherry pie
description: all american cherry pie with classic crisco pie crust, sugar, pillsbury best all purpose flour, salt, pitted cherries, red food coloring, butter, almond extract, large egg, milk
ingredients: 9.0 inch classic crisco pie crust, 0.8 cup sugar, 5.0 tablespoon pillsbury best all purpose flour, 0.1 teaspoon salt, 29.0 ounce pitted cherries, 3.0 drop red food coloring, 1.0 tablespoon butter, 0.5 teaspoon almond extract, 1.0 large egg, 2.0 tablespoon milk
steps: prepare as directed . do not bake . heat oven to 400degf . in a medium saucepan, combine sugar, flour and salt add reserved 1/4 cup cherry juice and red food coloring, if desired . stir until blended . add cherries . cook and stir over medium heat until mixture comes to a boil boil 1 minute . remove from heat stir in butter and almond extract . pour filling into unbaked pie crust . roll out top crust . using 1 1/2 inch star cutter, cut 3 stars in center of crust . place top crust over filling trim and seal . roll out leftover scraps to 1/8 inch thickness cut into star garnishes . place on crust as desired . in a small bowl beat egg yolk with fork . stir in half and half . brush over top . bake 40 minutes or until filling in center is bubbly and crust is golden brown . cover edge with foil, if necessary, to prevent overbrowning.

name: octopus rice with short fin squid tentacles
description: whether you use octopus or squid in this recipe, the outcome will be the same pure deliciousness . the squid or octopus, take your pick here is cooked in a pressure cooker for about a half hour to become perfectly tender and not the least bit chewy or dry . it's then combined wtih onion, garlic, tomatoes, bell pepper, and rice for a hearty meal in one . be sure to use long grain rice for best results.
ingredients: squid tentacles, 3.0 tablespoon olive oil, 1.0 onion, 2.0 clove garlic, 1.0 bay leaf, 2.0 tomatoes, 0.5 green pepper, 200.0 milliliter red wine, 300.0 rice, salt, fresh coriander
steps: cook the squid tentacles in the pressure cooker about 30 minutes . remove and cut into slices . boil the water . in a large pan with olive oil, saute the onion and the chopped garlic along with the bay leaf . add the peppers cut into squares, then the tomato already peeled and chopped . add the wine and wait a few more minutes to evaporate the alcohol . add the rice and 2 and 1/2 cups of cooking water of squid . this quality of rice is "careless", add more liquid if necessary . bake at low heat and season with salt . near the end of cooking add the pieces of squid . hot and sprinkled serve with fresh coriander.

name: chopped chicken salad with granch dressing
description: all too often, people give up on salad . plate, lettuce, dressing, fork, eat . not today, not this salad, not on our watch this salad will rock your world so hard that you'll want to dive in, face first, no fork, white knuckle grip on sides of bowl, for a hot mess of a salad eating experience . we start by making our killer granch dressing . yes, with a "g." a ripe, green avocado is smashed up with all the flavors of a classic ranch dressing . then we toss it with a variety of veg and time saving rotisserie chicken, and you're done . faceplant or fork, it's up to you, we won't judge.
ingredients: 1.0 avocado, 0.5 cup yogurt, 2.0 tablespoon dill, 2.0 garlic cloves, 1.0 tablespoon honey, 2.0 tablespoon sherry vinegar, 2.0 rotisserie chicken thighs, 2.0 cup watercress, 1.0 cucumber, 5.0 scallions, 1.0 pinch chili flakes, olive oil, salt, pepper, chilies, marinated peppers, artichokes
steps: grab your avocado and cut it in half rotating the avocado around your knife, not your knife around the avocado . score one half of the avocado and turn out into a large bowl . reserve the other half for topping the salad . to the bowl, add yogurt, a good drizzle of olive oil, and a big pinch of salt . now roughly chop the dill and garlic, and add them to the bowl . next add the honey and vinegar . with the back of a fork, mash up the dressing, like you would a gauc . take your rotisserie chicken thighs and chunk them up, right into the large bowl . next, toss in your watercress . peel your cucumber, slice it up, and add to the bowl . take your scallions and trim them down so you're just working with the whites . give the whites a rough chop and toss them in the bowl . remove the pit from your avocado hit it with your knife and then remove it from the knife using a towel so you don't cut yourself . score the avocado and turn out into the bowl . season the salad with salt, pepper, and chili flakes . toss to combine all the ingredients . grab a plate and pile high with salad . garnish with a bit more dill . faceplant into salad . hot tip is my avocado ripe peel back the stem, if it comes out easily with no green underneath, you're good to go

name: ham 'n chicken gumbo
description: ham 'n chicken gumbo with lipton recipe secrets onion soup mix, water, tomatoes, okra, green bell pepper, sliced, chopped celery, chopped parsley, garlic, cayenne pepper, cooked ham, cut up cooked chicken, regular or convert rice
ingredients: 1.0 envelope lipton recipe secrets onion soup mix, 3.0 cup water, 16.0 ounce tomatoes, 10.0 ounce okra, 0.5 cup green bell pepper, sliced, 0.3 cup chopped celery, 2.0 tablespoon chopped parsley, 1.0 clove garlic, 0.1 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 1.2 cup cooked ham, 1.0 cup cut up cooked chicken, 2.0 cup regular or convert rice
steps: combine lipton recipe secrets onion soup mix, water, tomatoes, okra, pepper, celery, parsley, garlic and pepper in 2 quart saucepan . bring to a boil over high heat . reduce heat to low and simmer covered, stirring occasionally, 45 minutes or until vegetables are tender . stir in ham and chicken heat through . serve over hot rice.

name: italian inspired stuffed pork chops
description: adjust the stuffing to suit your tastes and what you have on hand try different cheeses, like asiago, pecorino, or fontina, or different herbs, like basil, rosemary, or marjoram . it's also nice to add lemon zest . recipe courtesy of christine young, from dates to diapers
ingredients: 24.0 ounce new york pork chops, 8.0 ounce frozen chopped spinach, 0.5 cup parmesan cheese, 0.2 cup sun dried tomatoes, 1.0 tablespoon fresh oregano, 6.0 clove garlic, salt, black pepper
steps: squeeze the liquid out of the spinach . in a medium bowl, combine spinach, cheese, tomatoes, oregano, garlic, and salt and pepper to taste . cut a pocket into the side of each chop, making the opening as small as possible but the pocket as deep as possible . spoon spinach mixture into chops, distributing it evenly within the pockets and securing the opening with a toothpick if necessary . prepare a grill to medium and lightly oil the grate . season pork with salt and pepper and grill pork until internal temperature of the pork reaches 145 degrees f, 6 to 8 minutes per side . remove chops from grill and let rest 3 minutes before serving.

name: rice noodle salad with fresh vegetables and herbs
description: chef fiona knew exactly what to serve to dave matthews band and crew on a hot summer day in toronto, preparing her light, yet satisfying rice noodle salad with fresh vegetables and herbs . at home, try pairing the dish with the dreaming tree chardonnay.
ingredients: 1.0 rice noodles, 1.0 red pepper, 1.0 large carrot, 1.0 cucumber, 1.0 bunch scallions, 1.0 handful mung bean sprouts, 1.0 cup snap peas, 1.0 head romaine, 0.2 head green cabbage, 0.5 cup peanuts, 1.0 bunch basil, 1.0 bunch cilantro, 1.0 tablespoon ginger, 0.2 cup fish sauce, 1.0 lime, 2.0 tablespoon sambal oelek, 1.0 tablespoon tamari sauce, 1.0 tablespoon honey, 1.0 tablespoon rice vinegar, 1.0 tablespoon toasted sesame oil, black pepper
steps: mix all ingredients together and set aside until ready to serve . soak the rice noodles in hot water for about 10 minutes, until the noodles are soft and ready to eat . rinse with cold water and drain . set aside . if you have a mandolin, it would be very helpful for prepping the carrot and cucumber, but it is not necessary . all the prep can be done well ahead of serving . in a large bowl mix together all ingredients except romaine and cabbage . when ready to serve mix dressing into rice noodles, season with salt and pepper to taste . serve on a bed of romaine and cabbage . garnish with extra peanuts and herbs.

name: buffalo chicken meatballs
description: perfect for football season baked chicken meatballs with minced celery and carrots hidden inside, topped with hot sauce, and homemade blue cheese dressing yum
ingredients: oil spray, 1 1/4 lb ground chicken, 1/4 cup panko crumbs, 1 large egg, 2 scallions, 1/3 cup finely minced celery, 1/3 cup finely minced carrot, 1 clove crushed garlic, kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, 1/3 cup franks hot sauce, 1/4 cup skinny blue cheese dressing, finely chopped celery leaf for garnish
steps: preheat the oven to 400degf . lightly spray a non stick baking sheet with oil . in a large bowl, combine the ground chicken, panko crumbs, egg, scallions, celery, carrot and garlic season with salt and pepper, to taste . using clean hands, mix until combined . roll the mixture 1/8 cup each into 26 round meatballs . place meatballs onto prepared baking sheet and bake until cooked through and golden, about 16 to 18 minutes . place the meatballs in a bowl, add the buffalo sauce and gently toss to combine . serve immediately, drizzled with blue cheese dressing, if desired.

name: gluten free ricotta gnocchi
description: gluten free ricotta gnocchi with all purpose gluten free flour, xanthan gum, kosher salt, parmigiano, egg, whole milk ricotta cheese, extra virgin olive oil, tomato sauce, dried herbs
ingredients: 1.2 cup all purpose gluten free flour, 0.5 teaspoon xanthan gum, 0.5 teaspoon kosher salt, 3.0 ounce parmigiano, 1.0 egg, 1.0 pound whole milk ricotta cheese, extra virgin olive oil, tomato sauce, dried herbs
steps: in the bowl of your kitchenaid 7 cup food processor, place all of the ingredients in the order in which they are listed . pulse until the mixture begins to come together . turn the food processor on high and process until the mixture is thick and well combined . turn it out onto a lightly floured flat surface, sprinkle lightly with more flour, and pat into a disk . cover tightly with plastic wrap and place the dough in the refrigerator to chill for 10 minutes . once the dough has chilled, remove the plastic wrap and place on a lightly floured surface . using a sharp knife or a bench scraper, cut off pieces of dough and roll them into rounds that are about 1 1/2 inches in diameter, sprinkling lightly with more flour to prevent sticking . using the fingers of both hands and pushing away from your body, roll each round into a rope of dough about 6 inches long, and about 3/4 inch in diameter . be careful not to push down on the dough, but rather roll it out . sprinkle lightly with additional flour as necessary . using a sharp knife or bench scraper, cut the ropes of dough into 1 inch long pieces . mark the top of each piece with the floured tines of a fork to make ridges . continue to flour the tines of the fork as necessary to prevent sticking . to cook the gnocchi, drop them in batches in generously salted boiling water . the gnocchi will float after they have been boiling for about 2 minutes . continue to boil for another 2 minutes before removing with a strainer . allow most of the water to drain out of the strainer before placing the cooked gnocchi in a bowl and tossing it with a bit of olive oil to prevent the gnocchi from sticking to one another . instead of boiling the gnocchi, it can be sauteed in small batches in a light coating of hot olive oil in a large, heavy bottom saucepan over medium high heat until golden brown about 2 minutes per side . serve with tomato sauce, and fresh or dried herbs.

name: cranberry orange muffins
description: tart cranberries, zesty citrus, crunchy walnuts, and a touch of spice add up to a perfect breakfast treat during the holidays . the recipe is a yummly original created by sara mellas https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/sara 20mellas .
ingredients: 0.5 cup unsalted butter, 0.5 cup granulated sugar, 0.2 cup light brown sugar, 1.0 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2.0 large eggs, 0.5 cup sour cream, 2.0 tablespoon milk, 2.0 tablespoon orange juice, 1.0 orange, 1.8 cup all purpose flour, 0.5 teaspoon cinnamon, 1.0 dash allspice, 1.0 teaspoon baking powder, 1.0 teaspoon baking soda, 0.5 teaspoon salt, 1.0 cup fresh cranberries, 0.5 cup walnuts
steps: preheat the oven to 425degf . line a 12 cavity muffin pan with muffin/cupcake liners . in large mixing bowl, use a hand mixer to cream together the butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, and vanilla extract on medium high speed until smooth and combined, for 1 2 minutes . add the eggs and beat for a minute longer, until the mixture is pale and fluffy . add the sour cream, milk, orange juice, and orange zest . continue to beat until fully incorporated, scraping down the sides of the bowl with a rubber spatula . add the flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, allspice, and salt to the bowl . beat the mixture on medium low speed, scraping down the sides of the bowl with a rubber spatula as needed, until just combined . do not over mix . finely chop the walnuts, and coarsely chop the cranberries . add the cranberries and walnuts to the mixing bowl . use a rubber spatula to fold them into the batter until they are well distributed . spoon an even amount of batter into each muffin liner . bake the muffins on middle rack of oven for 5 minutes . reduce the oven temperature to 350degf . continue baking until a toothpick inserted in the center of a muffin comes out clean, 14 16 minutes . check to see that muffins are done . remove from oven or add time as needed . allow the muffins to cool in the pan for 5 minutes before removing and serving . store leftovers in an airtight container at room temperature for 2 days, or refrigerate for 3 days.

name: white bean crostini
description: none
ingredients: 2 cups cannelini or northern beans, 2 tbsp olive oil, 4 tbsp water, 1 tbsp fresh thyme, 1 clove garlic, salt and fresh pepper, 8 1/2 " piece of baguette, garlic clove, olive oil spray, extra thyme for garnish, balsamic vinegar
steps: cut the bread into 1/4" thin slices . you can toast these in the oven with a little olive oil spray at 400deg turning once until toasted or grill them . i used my george forman grill to toast them with a light spray of olive oil . once the bread is toasted, lightly rub it with a garlic clove cut in half . now your bread is ready to top . puree in a small blender or magic bullet all the ingredients for the white bean spread . if it's too dry you can add a little more water . top each piece with 2 tsp of white bean puree and garnish with fresh thyme . drizzle with a touch of balsamic right before serving.

name: tom yum kung
description: tom yum kung is the simple and popular thai hot and sour soup, familiar to many ... it is sometimes spelled tom yum koong or tom yum goong
ingredients: water, fish sauce, kaffir lime leaves, lemongrass, galangal, 2.0 cloves, salt, shrimp, scallions, straw mushrooms, limes juice, cilantro, chile peppers
steps: bring the water or stock, fish sauce, lime leaves, lemongrass, galangal, garlic, salt and pepper to a boil in a large pot over medium flame . reduce heat to low and simmer for 15 20 minutes . remove from heat and set aside for another 10 minutes to steep . strain through a fine meshed sieve and discard solids . return the stock to a simmer over medium low heat . add the shrimp, scallions and mushrooms and continue to simmer over medium low heat until shrimp is cooked through, 5 6 minutes . stir in the lime juice, cilantro and chilies, adjust seasoning and serve . add the shrimp shells from peeling the shrimp to the simmering stock for extra flavor . straw mushrooms are usually found canned . you can substitute thinly sliced button mushrooms if you like, or omit the mushrooms altogether . sliced bamboo shoots can be added if you like . if kaffir lime leaves are unavailable, zest the limes before juicing them and use the zest instead . tom kha kung substitute coconut milk for half or all the water or stock . tom yum gai substitute thinly sliced chicken for the shrimp . tom yum hed a vegetarian variation . eliminate the shrimp and double the amount of mushrooms.

name: luxury yule log
description: recipe adapted from slimming world and cadbury
ingredients: 3.0 eggs, 50.0 gram self raising flour, 15.0 gram cocoa, 60.0 gram caster sugar, 75.0 gram butter, 150.0 gram icing sugar, 2.0 tablespoon cocoa, 1.0 teaspoon water, 100.0 gram chocolate
steps: preheat oven to gas mark 6/200c line 30x20cm/12x8in swiss roll tin sift the flour and cocoa together and set aside whisk the eggs and sugar together until thick and creamy fold in the flour and cocoa with a metal spoon spoon the mixture into the lined tin and smooth the surface bake in the oven for 10 12 mins until cooked and springy to the touch . turn out onto a sheet of lightly sugared baking parchment . remove the lining paper trim the edges . then roll whilst still warm and leave to cool for the filling, mix the butter, icing sugar, cocoa and water . roll out the sponge and spread the mixture evenly over the sponge . roll the sponge back up as tight as you can removing the sugared lining paper as you go . for the topping, melt the cooking chocolate in a bowl over a a hot pan of water . once melted, leave to cool slightly before covering the sponge . once the sponge is covered, leave to cool completely . you can sprinkle on some cocoa or icing sugar for decorative effect.

name: brummel and brown angel cream
description: brummel and brown angel cream with frozen whipped topping, thawed, brummel and brown simply strawberry creamy fruit spread, sugar, angel food cake, cut into cubes, blueberries
ingredients: 2.0 cup frozen whipped topping, thawed, 0.5 cup brummel and brown simply strawberry creamy fruit spread, 1.0 tablespoon sugar, 1.0 angel food cake, cut into cubes, 1.0 cup blueberries
steps: beat whipped topping, brummel and brown simply strawberry creamy fruit spread and sugar n large bowl with wire whisk until fluffy . toss with remaining ingredients . chill until ready to serve.

name: new england pork tenderloin
description: new england pork tenderloin with pork tenderloin, apple jelly, lemon juice, pumpkin pie spice, apples
ingredients: 1.0 pork tenderloin, 0.2 cup apple jelly, 2.0 tablespoon lemon juice, 0.5 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice, 2.0 apples
steps: heat oven to 400 degrees f . in small bowl, combine apple jelly, lemon juice and pumpkin spice blend well . place pork tenderloin in shallow roasting pan, brush with half of the apple jelly mixture . roast for 20 minutes or until internal temperature on a thermometer reads 145 degrees f . let stand 5 minutes . place apple slices on broiler pan brush with remaining apple jelly mixture . broil 5 6 inches from heat for about 5 minutes or until apples slices are tender . slice tenderloin serve with apple slices.

name: skinny taco dip
description: this super easy, no cook skinny taco dip is a must have at any get together birthdays, football, holidays the dip always disappears serve with tortilla chips.
ingredients: 8 oz 1/3 less fat philadelphia cream cheese, 8 oz reduced fat sour cream, 16 oz jar mild salsa, 1/2 packet taco seasoning, 2 cups iceberg lettuce, 2 large tomatoes, 1 cup reduced fat shredded cheddar cheese, 2.25 oz sliced black olives
steps: in a large bowl combine cream cheese, sour cream, salsa and taco seasoning and mix well with an electric mixer . spread on the bottom of a large shallow glass dish . top with shredded lettuce, tomatoes, shredded cheese and black olives . serve with baked tortilla chips.

name: creme brulee with passion fruit
description: yum creme brulee with passion fruit this recipe is perfect for a saturday afternoon . not only is this creme brulee with passion fruit recipe full of nutrients that are great for your body, but it they taste delicious . try out this creme brulee with passion fruit at home and let us know your thoughts . you can comment below with your likes or dislikes and rate the recipe by star . happy cooking
ingredients: 0.5 passion fruit, 48.0 gram egg yolk, 45.0 gram powdered sugar, 150.0 gram whipping cream
steps: preheat oven to 90 deg c . open the passion fruit, remove the seeds and the juice and pass them through a small strainer to retrieve only the juice by crushing the seeds with a teaspoon . mix the egg yolks and sugar in a bowl . gradually add the cream and then the juice of passion fruit . pour the mixture into small ramekins or bowls . put the ramekins in the oven and bake for about 25 minutes until the mixture is cooked but slightly shaky . let cool down, then put in the refrigerator so that the cream sets . shortly before serving, sprinkle a little powdered sugar on the surface of each and use a torch or a grill to carmelize the tops . check to make sure that the creams do not burn . serve immediately after carmelizing to avoid the cream turning back into liquid.

name: strikjespasta met chorizo en paprika
description: strikjespasta met chorizo en paprika with farfalle, chorizo, paprika, wortels, uien, knorr kruidenpasta macaroni tradizionale
ingredients: 300.0 gram farfalle, 200.0 gram chorizo, 1.0 paprika, 2.0 wortels, 2.0 uien, 1.0 container knorr kruidenpasta macaroni tradizionale
steps: kook de farfalle beetgaar volgens de aanwijzingen op de verpakking . snijd de chorizo in reepjes . verwijder de zaden van de paprika . snijd de paprika en de wortels in stukjes en snipper de uien . verhit de olijfolie en bak de chorizo even aan met de paprika, de wortel en de ui . voeg 100 ml water en de kruidenpasta toe . breng de saus al roerend aan de kook en laat alles 2 3 minuten zachtjes doorkoken . schep om met de pasta en bak het geheel nog even op.

name: cheese and spinach stuffed chicken breasts
description: cheese and spinach stuffed chicken breasts with hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise, fresh spinach leaves, feta cheese, garlic, boneless, skinless chicken breast halves, prosciutto, equipment, pepper
ingredients: 0.5 cup hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise, 10.0 ounce fresh spinach leaves, 0.5 cup feta cheese, 2.0 clove garlic, 4.0 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves, 8.0 slice prosciutto, equipment, pepper
steps: preheat oven 375deg . mix hellmann's or best foods real mayonnaise, spinach, feta cheese and garlic in a bowl and make sure all ingredients are well mixed . once complete place the bowl aside . remove any extra fat from chicken breast.. use a sharp knife to butterfly each chicken breast.. make sure not to cut all the way through the breast . spoon spinach mixture into the chicken breasts . wrap two slices of the italian prosciutto around each chicken breast and secure with a toothpick . place the chicken breast on a baking sheet . bake for 1 hour or until chicken is thoroughly cooked.

name: tuscan green bean salad
description: tuscan green bean salad with green beans, radicchio, wish bone light italian dressing, grated parmesan cheese, pine nuts
ingredients: 1.0 pound green beans, 2.0 cup radicchio, 0.5 cup wish bone light italian dressing, 0.5 cup grated parmesan cheese, 2.0 tablespoon pine nuts
steps: toss all ingredients except pine nuts in large bowl . sprinkle with pine nuts . serve chilled or at room temperature.

name: pastasalade met paprika en tonijn
description: deze heerlijke pastasalade met paprika en tonijn kan niet zonder bertolli pasta pipe rigate . verrukkelijke maaltijdsalade voor 2 personen . is ook erg lekker bij een barbecue of op een zomerse avond.
ingredients: 250.0 gram pipe rigate, 2.0 paprika, 1.0 tablespoon bertolli voor koken, bakken en roerbakken, 1.0 inch olijfolie, 2.0 tonijnsteak, 100.0 milliliter italiaanse salade dressing, 2.0 tablespoon kappertjes, 15.0 gram basilicum
steps: kook de bertolli pasta pipe rigate volgens de aanwijzingen op de verpakking beetgaar . snijd de paprika's in dunne reepjes . verhit de bertolli voor koken, bakken en roerbakken in een pan met een dikke bodem en smoor hierin de paprika met wat peper, afgedekt in 5 6 minuten zachtjes gaar . giet de tonijn af en verdeel het visvlees in stukjes . meng de afgegoten en nog warme pasta met de dressing, paprika, tonijn en kappertjes . laat de salade afkoelen . schep vlak voor het serveren de grofgehakte basilicum erdoor.

name: easy blueberry buttermilk cake
description: this light and easy blueberry buttermilk cake loaded with fresh, juicy blueberries in a lightly sweetened, moist buttermilk cake is ideal for summer.
ingredients: 2 3/4 cups cake flour, 1 1/2 tsp baking soda, 1/2 tsp salt, 1 1/4 cups sugar, 4 tbsp unsalted butter, 3/4 cups unsweetened applesauce, 3/4 cups low fat buttermilk, 2 cups blueberries, 1 large egg, 2 large egg whites, 2 tsp vanilla, baking spray
steps: preheat oven to 325f . grease a 13 x 9 inch baking pan with baking spray . in a large bowl combine flour, baking soda, and salt in a large bowl . mix well . using a hand mixer or stand mixer, in a medium bowl, beat sugar and butter for about 3 minutes . add egg and egg whites one at a time and beat until combined . add buttermilk, vanilla and applesauce until incorporated . add wet ingredients to the flour mixture and stir until just blended . gently fold in blueberries . place the batter into the prepared cake pan bake cake until a toothpick comes out clean, about 30 32 minutes . serve room temperature.

name: steak and grape tomato italian salad
description: steak and grape tomato italian salad with wish bone romano basil vinaigrette dressing, sirloin steak, torn romaine lettuce leaves, grape tomatoes, grated parmesan cheese, italian seasoned croutons
ingredients: 1.0 cup wish bone romano basil vinaigrette dressing, 1.0 pound sirloin steak, 6.0 cup torn romaine lettuce leaves, 1.0 cup grape tomatoes, 0.2 cup grated parmesan cheese, 0.5 cup italian seasoned croutons
steps: pour 1/2 cup wish bone romano basil vinaigrette dressing over steak in shallow, nonaluminum baking dish or plastic bag turn to coat . cover, or close bag, and marinate in refrigerator, turning occasionally, 3 to 24 hours . remove steak from marinade, discarding marinade . grill or broil steak, turning once and brushing with 1/4 cup dressing, 10 minutes or until desired doneness . let steak rest, then thinly slice . toss lettuce with remaining 1/4 cup dressing in large serving bowl . top with sliced steak, tomatoes, cheese and croutons . serve, if desired, with freshly ground black pepper and additional dressing.

name: pig skin spaghetti with sausage, smoked puttanesca sauce, and pangritata
description: pig skin spaghetti with sausage, smoked puttanesca sauce, and pangritata with pork rind, pork sausages, smoked puttanesca sauce, pangritata, pork shoulder, pork belly, basil, lemon verbena, thyme, lemon zest, kosher salt, ground black pepper, white wine, garlic, shallots, tomatoes, onions, shallots, mirepoix, white wine, capers, anchovies, mint, kosher salt, ground black pepper, bread crumbs, parsley, lemon zest, kosher salt, ground black pepper
ingredients: 1.0 pork rind, pork sausages, smoked puttanesca sauce, pangritata, 8.0 pound pork shoulder, 2.0 pound pork belly, 0.5 ounce basil, 0.5 ounce lemon verbena, 0.5 ounce thyme, 0.5 ounce lemon zest, kosher salt, ground black pepper, 0.5 cup white wine, 2.0 garlic, 2.0 shallots, 1.0 pound tomatoes, 2.0 onions, 4.0 shallots, 1.0 pound mirepoix, 2.0 ounce white wine, 0.5 ounce capers, 0.5 ounce anchovies, 0.5 ounce mint, kosher salt, ground black pepper, bread crumbs, parsley, lemon zest, kosher salt, ground black pepper
steps: blanch skin for 1 1/2 hours clean skin and scrape cut into 1/8 inch strips like noodles brown pork sausage add smoked puttanesca sauce and toss to combine garnish with pangritata combine all ingredients and grind following basic sausage guidelines smoke tomatoes, onions and shallots for 1 hour sweat mirepoix until soft, add tomatoes, onions and shallots process tomato mixture through a foodmill simmer and reduce sauce by twenty percent finish sauce with white wine, capers, anchovies and mint combine all ingredients

name: air fryer asian glazed boneless chicken thighs
description: these asian glazed chicken thighs come out so juicy and delicious in the air fryer perfect with brown rice and steamed veggies on the side.
ingredients: 32 ounces 8 boneless, skinless chicken thighs, fat trimmed, 1/4 cup low sodium soy sauce, 2 1/2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar, 1 tablespoon honey, 3 cloves garlic, 1 teaspoon sriracha hot sauce, 1 teaspoon fresh grated ginger, 1 scallion
steps: in a small bowl combine the balsamic, soy sauce, honey, garlic, sriracha and ginger and mix well . pour half of the marinade 1/4 cup into a large bowl with the chicken, covering all the meat and marinate at least 2 hours, or as long as overnight . reserve the remaining sauce for later . preheat the air fryer to 400f . remove the chicken from the marinade and transfer to the air fryer basket . cook in batches 14 minutes, turning halfway until cooked through in the center . meanwhile, place the remaining sauce in a small pot and cook over medium low heat until it reduces slightly and thickens, about 1 to 2 minutes . to serve, drizzle the sauce over the chicken and top with scallions.

name: raw beet and apple salad with quinoa
description: raw beet and apple salad with quinoa with beets, fuji apples, baby arugula, cooked quinoa, blue cheese, roasted sunflower seeds, extra virgin olive oil, apple cider vinegar, ginger, cayenne, honey, fresh lemon juice, salt, freshly ground black pepper
ingredients: 2.0 beets, 2.0 fuji apples, 4.0 cup baby arugula, 1.0 cup cooked quinoa, 4.0 tablespoon blue cheese, 0.2 cup roasted sunflower seeds, 0.2 cup extra virgin olive oil, 0.2 cup apple cider vinegar, 1.0 teaspoon ginger, 0.2 teaspoon cayenne, 1.0 teaspoon honey, 1.0 tablespoon fresh lemon juice, 0.2 teaspoon salt, freshly ground black pepper
steps: for dressing, combine olive oil, vinegar, lemon juice, ginger, honey, red pepper and black pepper in jar with tight fitting lid shake until well blended . attach spiralizer attachment to your kitchenaid stand mixer . center one beet on fruit and vegetable skewer attach to spiralizer . attach peeler blade and fine spiralizing blade and position at end of beet . position bowl below beet to catch beets and peel . turn mixer to speed 4 and process until blade reaches end of beet . repeat with remaining beet . remove peeling blade and fine spiralizing blade . attach large core slice blade to spiralizer . center one apple on fruit and vegetable skewer attach to spiralizer . position large core slice blade at end of apple place bowl under blade to catch apple . turn mixer to speed 6 and process until blade reaches end of apple . repeat with remaining apple . divide arugula among 4 serving plates . top with beets, apples and quinoa sprinkle with blue cheese and sunflower seeds . serve with dressing

name: baked ziti with spinach
description: baked ziti is a favorite comfort dish in my home adding spinach is a quick and easy way to get more leafy greens into your family's diet without complaints.
ingredients: 12 oz uncooked ziti, 28 oz crushed tomatoes, 1 tsp olive oil, 3 cloves garlic, 10 oz package frozen spinach, 1 tsp oregano, 2 tbsp chopped fresh basil, kosher salt and fresh pepper to taste, 8 oz fat free ricotta, 1/4 cup grated parmesan cheese, 2 cups shredded part skim mozzarella 8 oz i recommend polly o, olive oil cooking spray
steps: preheat oven to 375degf . spray a 9x13 inch baking pan with oil spray . in a large pot of salted water, cook pasta according to instructions until al dente i like to under cook it 3 or 4 minutes as it will cook more in the oven . drain and return to pot . meanwhile, in a medium saucepan, add olive oil and saute garlic . add chopped spinach, salt, pepper and crushed tomatoes . season with basil, oregano, salt and pepper and cook 5 minutes . add sauce to the pasta and combine . add half of the mozzarella, parmesan cheese and ricotta . mix well then transfer to the baking pan . pour the pasta mixture into the prepared pan and spread evenly . top with the remaining mozzarella and cover with foil . bake for 30 minutes, or until mozzarella is melted and the edges are lightly browned . let it cool 5 minutes before serving.

name: japanese melonpan
description: these traditional japanese sweet buns are light and airy . they get their name from the thin layer of cookie dough that is baked on top of the dough, which crackles as it bakes and gives them the appearance of a melon . in this version, the delicate cookie dough that covers the sweetened yeast dough is flavored with lemon juice and zest for a bit of tartness that perfectly accents the sweetness of the dough.
ingredients: 35.0 gram butter, 65.0 gram sugar, 1.0 egg, 120.0 gram white flour, 1.0 lemon, 1.0 lemon, 250.0 gram white flour, 8.0 gram powdered milk, 65.0 gram sugar, 3.0 gram salt, 5.0 gram yeast, 2.0 tablespoon egg yolk, 1.0 tablespoon egg white, 100.0 milliliter water, 25.0 gram butter
steps: mix butter and sugar in a large bowl . add the egg and slowly add the 120 grams white flour while stirring the mixture . add the lemon juice and lemon zest, and mix until you obtain dough . remove the dough from the bowl and cover it completely with plastic wrap . let it sit in the refrigerator for 3 to 4 hours . mix the white flour, milk, sugar, salt, and yeast in a large bowl . add the egg white, egg yolk, water, and mix until the dough has a soft texture . place the dough in the counter top and knead . flatten the dough, add butter, and keep kneading it for 10 minutes . form a dough ball and cover it with plastic film . let it sit in a warm place until it doubles its size . this takes from 1 to 2 hours . sprinkle the counter top with flour and place the dough ball there . roll it until it stretches and separate it in portions about 35 grams each . shape each portion into balls, sprinkle white flour over a cooking tray, place the portions on the tray, and cover the tray with plastic film . let them sit for 20 minutes in a warm place . take the frosting dough from the fridge and place it on the counter top . roll it until it stretches and separate it in circle shaped portions about 8 centimeters wide . sprinkle white flour on another cooking tray, place the dough circles on the tray, and cover the tray with plastic film . let them sit for 15 minutes at room temperature while you preheat the oven at 180 c . remove the plastic wrap from both trays . sprinkle with water the dough balls and cover them with the dough circles on top . sprinkle each melonpan with sugar, place them on a greased cooking tray, and bake for 12 to 15 minutes at 180 c . remove them from the oven, let them cool off completely, and serve.

name: multi purpose onion tomato gravy with just 10 ingredients
description: this indian basic onion tomato gravy is easiest but super tasty gravy with just 10 ingredients contains 5 vegetables 5 spices . this traditional indian style onion tomato gravy can be used as base for all types of vegetables or tofu paneer and its referred as curry or subji.
ingredients: 2.0 cup tomato puree, 0.8 cup onion puree, 2.0 tablespoon garlic paste, 1.0 tablespoon ginger paste, 2.0 tablespoon oil, salt, 1.0 tablespoon red chili powder, 1.0 tablespoon garam masala, 1.0 tablespoon sugar
steps: in a pan, heat the oil and add onion paste first . cook it for 1 2 minutes and add garlic paste, ginger paste, green chili paste . cook till onion gets golden and oil gets separate out.in a pan, heat the oil and add onion paste first . cook it for 1 2 minutes and add garlic paste, ginger paste, green chili paste . cook till onion gets golden and oil gets separate out . then add tomato puree, salt to taste and sugar into it . cover the pan with lid and cook for at least 10 minutes on medium flame till all moisture evaporate and gravy is becomes thick and almost half in quantity . at last add red chili powder and garam masala, stir well and cook until oil gets separated from gravy . it may take 5 minutes . then gravy is ready for use . let it cool down at room temperature and store in air tight container in fridge for 15 days.

name: baby spinach salad with honey roasted butternut squash, pumpkin seeds, gorgonzola and dried cherries
description: the sweet salty combination of the roasted butternut squash, dried cherries and gorgonzola cheese along with the slight crunch of the pumpkin seeds topped with a honey dijon vinaigrette will have you savoring every bite of this spinach salad
ingredients: 1 1/4 lbs butternut squash, 1 tbsp olive oil, 1 tbsp honey, kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, 1 1/2 tbsp olive oil, 1 1/2 tbsp white balsamic vinegar, 1 tbsp honey, 1/2 tbsp minced shallots, 2 tsp dijon mustard, salt and fresh black pepper, 5 oz baby spinach, 1/4 cup raw, 3 tbsp dried cherries, 1/4 cup reduced fat crumbled gorgonzola
steps: preheat the oven to 400deg . in a large bowl, toss the butternut squash with 1 tablespoon of olive oil, 1 tablespoon honey, salt and fresh ground pepper . place on a baking sheet and roast in the center of the oven for 20 25 minutes, turning half way, or until tender . when done, remove from the oven and let it cool to room temperature . meanwhile, combine the vinegar, shallots, remaining honey, mustard and whisk in oil, pinch of salt black pepper . divide the spinach on 4 plates and top each salad with the roasted butternut squash, pumpkin seeds, dried cherries, and the crumbled gorgonzola cheese . drizzle the dressing over each salad and serve immediately.

name: mar tea ni
description: mar tea ni with vodka, lipton ready to drink original white tea with tangerine
ingredients: 0.2 cup vodka, 0.5 cup lipton ready to drink original white tea with tangerine
steps: in shaker filled with ice, shake lipton ready to drink lemon sweetened iced tea and vodka, then strain into martini glasses . garnish, if desired, with twist of lemon.

name: knock your stilettos off shooters
description: knock your stilettos off shooters with vodka, habanero chili pepper, watermelon, lipton sparkling diet green tea with strawberry kiwi
ingredients: 0.5 cup vodka, 0.5 teaspoon habanero chili pepper, 10.0 watermelon, 10.0 tablespoon lipton sparkling diet green tea with strawberry kiwi
steps: combine vodka with chili pepper in small bowl let stand 20 minutes . strain remove chili pepper reserve vodka . chill until ready to use . to serve, pour scant tablespoon reserved vodka mixture into 10 chilled shot glasses . add 1 melon ball to each, then pour in lipton sparkling diet green tea with strawberry kiwi . garnish, if desired, with small cilantro sprig . serve immediately.

name: groene lasagne met pittige gehaktsaus
description: heerlijke groene lasagne met pittige gehaktsaus bertolli pastasaus pittige . boordevol gezonde ingredienten zoals bladspinazie, paprika, ui, courgette, rundergehakt, knoflook en bertolli koken, bakken en roerbakken . heerlijke lasagne uit de italiaanse keuken voor 4 personen.
ingredients: 225.0 gram bladspinazie, 1.0 ui, 1.0 paprika, 1.0 courgette, 1.0 tablespoon ei, 450.0 gram rundergehakt, 1.0 clove knoflook, 1.0 bag bertolli pastasaus pittig, 1.0 packet lasagnebladen, 200.0 gram kaas
steps: verwarm de oven voor tot 180oc . ontdooi de bladspinazie volgens de aanwijzingen op de verpakking . pel en snipper de ui . snijd de paprika en de courgette in stukjes . verwarm de bertolli vloeibaar in een ruime wok of hapjespan en bak hierin het gehakt met het uitgeperste teentje knoflook bruin en rul . voeg nu de ui, paprika en courgette toe en roerbak dit mengsel enkele minuten op hoog vuur . schenk de bertolli pastasaus pittig en de ontdooide bladspinazie erbij en laat de saus 5 minuten pruttelen op laag vuur . vet ondertussen een ovenschaal in . verdeel enkele lepels saus over de bodem . bedek de saus met een laag lasagnebladen en schep daarop weer een dun laagje saus . ga zo door totdat alles op is, eindig met een laag saus . verdeel de pittige kaas over het gerecht en bak de lasagne in 35 minuten gaar.

name: sausage and cheese quiche
description: hearty and easy, this simple and delicious brunch dish is sure to be a hit with both you and your family . the recipe is a yummly original created by sara mellas https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/sara 20mellas .
ingredients: 1.0 frozen pie shell, 8.0 ounce breakfast sausage, 4.0 eggs, 0.8 cup whole milk, 0.2 cup heavy cream, 0.2 teaspoon salt, 0.2 teaspoon black pepper, 2.0 ounce low moisture mozzarella cheese, 2.0 ounce shredded cheddar cheese
steps: preheat the oven to 400degf . move a rack to the lowest position in the oven . poke the bottom of the frozen pie shell several times with a fork, and transfer to a baking sheet . bake the pie shell on bottom rack of oven until the bottom is slightly puffed, 12 14 minutes, or according to package directions . when done, remove from oven and set aside . reduce the oven temperature to 350degf . place two sheets of paper towels on a large dinner plate . set aside . set a large skillet over medium high heat . place the sausage in the skillet . cook until browned, using a rubber spatula to break up the sausage into small pieces as it cooks, 5 7 minutes . transfer the sausage to the paper towel lined dinner plate to drain . in a large mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, heavy cream, salt, and black pepper, until smooth . add the sausage and shredded cheeses to the egg and milk mixture . fold with a rubber spatula until evenly distributed . pour the egg, sausage, and cheese mixture into the pie shell . cover the edges of the pie shell with pie guards or strips of aluminum foil to avoid burning or over browning the crust . bake the quiche on bottom rack of oven until the top is firm and golden brown, 45 55 minutes . check to see that quiche is done . remove from oven or add time as needed . allow to cool for at least 30 minutes at room temperature before slicing and serving . leftover quiche may be stored covered in the refrigerator for up to 3 days.

name: fat free roasted chickpeas
description: roasted chickpeas with no added oil are a crunchy, low calorie snack.
ingredients: 1.0 can garbanzo beans, nonstick cooking spray, 0.5 teaspoon salt, 0.1 teaspoon black pepper
steps: preheat oven to 400degf . line a large baking sheet with parchment paper . drain garbanzo beans in a fine mesh sieve and rinse thoroughly with cold water . turn garbanzo beans onto a clean dishcloth, and pat dry with paper towels . place garbanzo beans on prepared baking sheet . spray with an even layer of nonstick cooking spray, and sprinkle with salt and black pepper . roast for 35 40 minutes on middle rack of oven, shaking baking sheet twice during cooking time, until garbanzo beans are golden brown and crisp . check to see that garbanzo beans are done . remove from oven or add time as needed . transfer garbanzo beans to a bowl, and serve immediately.

name: pasta alfredo with pancetta and arugula
description: pasta alfredo with pancetta and arugula with bertolli classico olive oil, pancetta, chopped walnuts, anchovy fillets, bertolli alfredo sauce, arugula, pasta
ingredients: 2.0 tablespoon bertolli classico olive oil, 0.2 cup pancetta, 0.2 cup chopped walnuts, 2.0 anchovy fillets, 1.0 jar bertolli alfredo sauce, 2.0 bunch arugula, 1.0 pound pasta
steps: heat olive oil in 12 inch nonstick skillet over medium high heat and cook pancetta, stirring frequently, until crisp . stir in walnuts and anchovy heat through . reduce heat to medium low, then stir in sauce heat through . combine sauce mixture with hot pasta in large bowl, then stir in arugula.

name: lemon bundt cake
description: bright and tangy, this lemon bundt cake is a show stopping summertime or anytime dessert . the recipe is a yummly original created by sara mellas https //www.yummly.com/dish/author/sara 20mellas .
ingredients: nonstick cooking spray, 0.8 cup unsalted butter, 1.8 cup granulated sugar, 2.0 teaspoon vanilla extract, 4.0 large eggs, 3.0 lemons, 0.3 cup sour cream, 3.0 cup all purpose flour, 2.0 teaspoon baking powder, 0.8 teaspoon baking soda, 0.5 teaspoon salt, 0.8 cup buttermilk
steps: preheat the oven to 350degf . spray a bundt cake pan liberally with nonstick cooking spray . set aside . place the butter, sugar, lemon zest, and vanilla into a large mixing bowl . using a hand mixer or stand mixer fitted with a whisk attachment, cream the ingredients together on medium speed for 1 minute, or until smooth . add the eggs and sour cream, and continue to beat for a minute more, until the mixture is light and fluffy . sift the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt into the bowl . beat the mixture on low until the ingredients begin to come together . slowly stream in the milk and continue mixing, scraping down the sides of the bowl with a rubber spatula as needed, until a smooth, medium thick batter forms . pour the batter into the bundt pan . bake the bundt cake on the middle rack of oven until a toothpick inserted in the center of the cake comes out clean, 55 70 minutes . check to see that cake is done . remove from oven or add time as needed . allow the cake to cool in the pan for 15 20 minutes . to release the cake, run a butter knife between the edge of the cake and the pan . turn the cake onto a large serving plate allow the cake to cool for 1 2 hours before slicing and serving . dust with powdered sugar if desired.

name: white russian cocktail
description: read full description on http //bit.ly/1ktxbhy
ingredients: 1.5 ounce vodka, 1.0 ounce coffee liquor, 1.0 ounce heavy cream, cinnamon, 1.0 cinnamon stick, ice
steps: read full description on http //bit.ly/1ktxbhy

name: hot pot soup
description: gingery chicken broth that caresses bite size morsels of fresh aromatic vegetables and herbs, interlaced with silky rice noodles with chicken or tofu.
ingredients: 2.0 inch fresh ginger, 0.2 sweet onion, 1.0 cup carrot, 2.0 teaspoon dark soy sauce, 1.0 quart chicken stock, 2.0 cup chicken, 1.0 cup shiitake mushroom, 1.0 cup asparagus spears, dried rice noodles, 2.0 tablespoon coconut oil, fresh cilantro, sriracha hot sauce, lime wedge
steps: saute onion, ginger and carrots in 1 tbsp coconut oil . add shiitake mushrooms and asparagus and saute for 1 2 minutes more . drizzle with 1 tsp . dark soy sauce . add chicken or tofu . pour in chicken broth and bring to simmer . add cooked rice noodles just before serving, garnish with cilantro, sriracha and lime wedge,

name: broccoli idaho potato gratin
description: yummy gratin made with roasted idaho potatoes, broccoli and sharp cheddar cheese . a delicious vegetarian entree or side . kosher for passover.
